GSP29nysvbh1u:8_0: nārhtapratipattim antareṇa pravṛttisāmarthyam / pramāṇena khalv ayaṃ jñātārtham abhīpsati
GSP29nysvbh1u:8_1: jihāsati vā / tasyepsājihāsāprayuktasya samīhā pravṛttir ity ucyate / sāmrthyaṃ punar
GSP29nysvbh1u:8_2: asyāḥ phalenābhisambandhaḥ / samīhamānas tam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā tam artham
GSP29nysvbh1u:8_3: āpnoti jahāti vā / arthas tu sukhaṃ sukhahetuś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:12: prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṅkhyeyatvāt/ arthavati ca pramāṇe pramātā prameyaṃ pramitir ity arthavanti bhavanti/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:21: sataś ca sadbhāvo 'sataśüEcāsadbhāvaḥ/ sat sad iti gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtam aviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:23: asac cāsad iti gṛhyamāṇaṃ yathābhūtam aviparītaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:26: saty upalabhyamāne tadanupalabdheḥ pradīpavat/ yathā darśakena dīpena dṛśye gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:27: tan nāsti/ yady abhaviṣyad idam iva vyajñāsyata,
GSP29nysvbh1u:28: vijñānābhāvān nāstīti/ evaṃ pramāṇena sati gṛhyamāṇe tad iva yan na gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:30: tan nāsti/ yady abhaviṣyad idam iva vyajñāsyata,
GSP29nysvbh1u:31: vijñānābhāvān nāstīti/ tad evaṃ sataḥ prakāśakaṃ pramāṇam asad api prakāśayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:33: sac ca khalu ṣoḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate/ tāsāṃ khalv āsāṃ sadvidhānām---
GSP29nysvbh1u:38: nirdeśe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ/ cārthe dvandvasamāsaḥ/ pramāṇādīnāṃ tattvam iti śaiṣikī ṣaṣṭhī/
GSP29nysvbh1u:40: tattvasya jñānaṃ niḥśreyasasyādhigama iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhau/ ta etāvanto vidyamānārthāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:43: so 'yam anavayavena tantrārtha uddiṣṭo veditavyaḥ/ ātmādeḥ khalu prameyasya tattvajñānān niḥśreyasādhigamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:47: tasyopāyo 'dhigantavya ity etāni catvāry arthapadāni samyag buddhvā niḥśreyasam adhigacchati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:49: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanam anarthakam --- saṃśayādayo yathāsambhavaṃ pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu cāntarbhavanto na vyatiricyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:51: imās tu catasro vidyāḥ pṛthakprasthānāḥ prāṇabhṛtām anugrahāyopadiśyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:54: tasyāḥ pṛthakprasthānāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ padārthāḥ/ teṣāṃ pṛthagvacanam antareṇādhyātmavidyāmātram iyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:55: yathopaniṣadaḥ/ tasmāt saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate/ tatra nānupalabdhe na nirṇīte 'rthe nyāyaḥ pravartate, kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:56_1: iti / vimarśaḥ --- saṃśayaḥ / pakṣapratipakṣau --- nyāyapravṛttiḥ / arthāvadhāraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:56_2: --- nirṇayas tattvajñānam iti / sa ca ``ayaṃ kiṃsvid'' iti vastuvimarśamātram anavadhāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:60: tat prayojanam/ yam artham abhīpsan jihāsan vā karmārabhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:62: tenānena sarve prāṇinaḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś ca vidyā vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:63: tadāśrayaś ca nyāyaḥ pravartate/ kaḥ punar ayaṃ nyāyaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:67_0: sānvīkṣā / pratyakṣāgamābhyām īkṣitasyānvīkṣaṇam anvīkṣā / tayā pravarttata ity ānvīkṣikī
GSP29nysvbh1u:67_1: --- nyāyavidyā --- nyāyaśāstram / yat punar anumānaṃ pratyakṣāgamaviruddhaṃ nyāyābhāsaḥ sa iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:69: tatra vādajalpau saprayojanau/ vitaṇḍā tu parīkṣyate/ vitaṇḍayā pravartamāno vaitaṇḍikaḥ/ sa prayojanam anuyukto yadi pratipadyate so 'sya pakṣaḥ so 'sya siddhānta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:70: vaitaṇḍikatvaṃ jahāti/ atha na pratipadyate nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ity āpadyate/ athāpi parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanaṃ bravīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:71: etad api tādṛg eva/ yo jñāpayati yo jānāti yena jñāpyate yac ca jñāpyate etac ca pratipadyate yadi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:72: tadā vaitaṇḍikatvaṃ jahāti/ atha na pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:73: parapakṣapratiṣedhajñāpanaṃ prayojanam ity etad asya vākyam anarthakaṃ bhavati/ vākyasamūhaś ca sthāpanāhīno vitaṇḍā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:75: so 'sya pakṣaḥ sthāpanīyo bhavati/ atha na pratipadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:78: atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayo 'rthaḥ, yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ darśanaṃ na vyāhanyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:80: sa ca prameyam/ tasya pṛthagvacanaṃ ca tadāśrayāv anumānāgamau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:81: tasmin sati syātām anumānāgamau asati ca na syātām/ tadāśrayā ca nyāyapravṛttiḥ/ dṛṣṭāntavirodhena ca parapakṣapratiṣedho vacanīyo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:82_0: dṛṣṭāntasamādhinā ca svapakṣaḥ sādhanīyo bhavati / nāstikaś ca dṛṣṭāntam abhyupagacchann
GSP29nysvbh1u:82_1: āstikatvaṃ jahāti / anabhyupagacchan kiṃsādhanaḥ param upālabheteti / niruktena ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:82_2: dṛṣṭāntena śakyam abhidhātuṃ ``sādhyasādharmyāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam''
GSP29nysvbh1u:84: asty ayam ity anujñāyamāno 'rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ/ sa ca prameyam/ tasya pṛthagvacanaṃ satsu siddhāntabhedeṣu vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante, nāto 'nyatheti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:86: sādhanīyārthasya yāvati śabdasamūhe siddhiḥ parisamāpyate tasya pañcāvayavāḥ pratijñādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:89: teṣu pramāṇasamavāyaḥ, āgamaḥ pratijñā/ hetur anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:93: sarveṣām ekārthasamavāye sāmarthyapradarśanaṃ nigamanam iti/ so 'yaṃ paramo nyāya iti/ etena vādajalpavitaṇḍāḥ pravartante nāto 'nyatheti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:95: tadāśrayā ca tattvavyavasthā/ te caite 'vayavāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ santaḥ prameye 'ntarbhūtā evamarthaṃ pṛthag ucyanta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:98: pramāṇānām anugrāhakas tattvajñānāya kalpate/ tasyodāharaṇam --- kim idaṃ janma kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:101: evam avijñāte 'rthe kāraṇopapattyā ūhaḥ pravarttate --- yadi kṛtakena hetunā nirvartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:104: ato 'kasmān nirvartyamānaṃ na punar nivartsyatīti nivṛttikāraṇaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:105: tena janmānuccheda iti/ etasmiṃs tarkaviṣaye karmanimittaṃ janmeti pramāṇāni pravarttamānāni tarkeṇānugṛhante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:107_0: tattvajñānaviṣayasya vibhāgāt tattvajñānāya kalpate tarka iti / so 'yam itthambhūtas
GSP29nysvbh1u:107_1: tarkaḥ pramāṇasahito vāde sādhanāyopālambhāya cārthasya bhavatīty evam arthaṃ pṛghag
GSP29nysvbh1u:111: tasya pālanārthaṃ jalpaviṭaṇḍe/ tāv etau tarkanirṇayau lokayātrāṃ vahata iti/ so 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ prameyāntarbhūta evamarthaṃ pṛthag uddīṣṭa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:115: pṛthag uddiṣṭa upalakṣaṇārtham/ upalakṣitena vyavahāras tattvajñānāya bhavatīti/ ``tadviśeṣau jalpavitaṇḍe tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇārtham'' ity uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:117: nigrahasthānebhyaḥ pṛthag uddhiṣṭā hetvābhāsā vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:121: chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ pṛthagupadeśa upalakṣaṇārtham iti/ upalakṣitānāṃ svavākye parivarjanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:122: chalajātinigrahasthānānāṃ paravākye paryanuyogaḥ/ jāteś ca pareṇa prayujyamānāyāḥ sulabhaḥ samādhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:129: tad idaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamārthaṃ yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam/ iha tv adhyātmavidyāyām ātmādijñānaṃ tattvajñānam/ niḥśreyasādhigamo 'pavargaprāptiḥ//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:133: tat khalu niḥśreyasaṃ kiṃ tattvajñānāntaram eva bhavati? nety ucyate/ kiṃ tarhi? tattvajñānāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:139: ātmani tāvan nāstīti, anātmani ātmeti duḥkhe sukham iti anitye nityam ity atrāṇe trāṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:147: pretyabhāve nāsti jantur jīvo vā sattva ātmā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:154: dehendriyabuddhivedanāsantānocchedapratisandhānābhyāṃ nirātmakaḥ pretyabhāva iti/ apavarge bhīṣmaḥ khalv ayaṃ sarvakāyoparamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:155: sarvaviprayoge 'pavarge bahu ca bhadrakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvasukhocchedam acaitanyam amum apavargaṃ rocayed iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:157: pratikūleṣu dveṣaḥ/ rāgadveṣādhikārāc cāsatyerṣyamāyālobhādayo doṣā bhavanti/ doṣaiḥ prayuktaḥ śarīreṇa pravarttamāno hiṃsāsteyapratiṣiddhamaithunāny ācarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:159: manasā paradrohaṃ paradravyābhīpsāṃ nāstikyaṃ ceti/ seyaṃ pāpātmikā pravṛttir adharmāya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:160: atha śubhā --- śarīreṇa dānaṃ paritrāṇaṃ paricaraṇaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:161: vācā satyaṃ hitaṃ priyaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:162: manasā dayām aspṛhāṃ śraddhāṃ ceti/ seyaṃ dharmāya/
GSP29nysvbh1u:166: seyaṃ pravṛttiḥ kutsitasyābhipūjitasya ca janmanaḥ kāraṇam/ janma punaḥ śarīrendriyabuddhīnāṃ nikāyaviśiṣṭaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:167: tasmin sati duḥkham/ tat punaḥ pratikūlavedanīyaṃ bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti/ ta ime mithyājñānādayo duḥkhāntā dharmā avicchedenaiva pravartamānāḥ saṃsāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:177: tattvajñānaṃ tu khalu mithyājñānaviparyayeṇa vyākhyātam/ ātmani --- tāvad astīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:179: evaṃ duḥkhe 'nitye 'trāṇe sabhaye jugupsite hātavye ca yathāviṣayaṃ veditavyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:183: pretyabhāve khalu --- asti jantur jīvaḥ sattva ātmā vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:186: nimittavān janmoparama ity anādiḥ pretyabhāvo 'pavargānta iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:189: apavarge śāntaḥ khalv ayaṃ sarvaviprayogaḥ sarvoparamo 'pavargaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:190: bahu ca kṛcchaṃ ghoraṃ pāpakaṃ lupyata iti kathaṃ buddhimān sarvaduḥkhocchedaṃ sarvaduḥkhāsaṃvidam apavargaṃ na rocayed iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:192: tad yathā madhuviṣasampṛktānnam anādeyam iti, evaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktam anādeyam iti//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:196: --- uddeśo lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti/ tatra nāmadheyena padārthamātrasyābhidhānam uddśaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:198: tatroddiṣṭasya tattvavyavacchedako dharmao lakṣaṇam/ lakṣitasya yathālakṣaṇam upapadyate na veti pramāṇair avadhāraṇaṃ parīkṣā/ tatroddiṣṭasya pravibhaktasya lakṣaṇam ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:200: yathā --- pramāṇānāṃ prameyasya ca/ uddhiṣṭasya lakṣitasya ca vibhāgavacanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:205: akṣasyākṣasya prativiṣayaṃ vṛttiḥ pratyakṣam/ vṛttis tu --- sannikarṣaḥ, jñānaṃ vā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:207: yadā sannikarṣas tadā jñānaṃ pramitiḥ, yadā jñānam, tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:209: anumānaṃ --- mitena liṅgena liṅgino 'rthasya paścān mānam anumānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:211: upamānaṃ --- sāmīpyajñānaṃ --- yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/ sāmīpyaṃ tu sāmānyayogaḥ/ śabdaḥ --- śabdyate 'nenārtha ity abhidhīyate jñāpyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:213: upalabdhisādhanāni pramāṇāni samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt boddhavyam/ pramīyate 'neneti karaṇārthābhidhāno hi pramāṇaśabdaḥ/ tadviśeṣasamākhyāyā api tathaiva vyākhyānam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:214: kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇāni prameyam abhisaṃplavante? atha pratiprameyaṃ vyavatiṣṭhanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:219: pratyakṣaṃ --- yuñjānasya yogasamādhijam ``ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣād ātmā pratyakṣa'' iti/ agnir āptopadeśāt pratīyate ``atrāgniḥ''iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:221: pratyāsannena ca pratyakṣata upalabhyate/ vyavasthā punaḥ --- ``agnihotra juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:223: na pratyakṣam/ stanayitnuśabde śrūyamāṇe śabdahetor anumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:225: nāgamaḥ/ pāṇau pratyakṣata upalabhyamāne nānumānam, nāgama iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:226: sā ceyaṃ pramitiḥ pratyakṣaparā/ jijñāsitam artham āptopadeśāt pratipadyamāno liṅgadarśanenāpi bubhutsate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:229: upalabdhe 'rthe jijñāsā nivarttate/ pūrvoktam udāharaṇam ``agniḥ'' iti/ pramātuḥ pramāṇānāṃ sambhavo 'bhisaṃplavaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:236: 1.4: indriyārthasannikarṣottpannaṃ jñānam avyapadeśyam avyabhicāri vyavasāyātmakaṃ pratyakṣam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:237: indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād utpadyate yaj jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:239: na tarhīdānīm idaṃ bhavati, ātmā manasā saṃyujyate, mana indriyeṇa, indriyam artheneti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:241: nedaṃ kāraṇāvadhāraṇam --- etāvat pratyakṣe kāraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:242: kiṃ tu viśiṣṭakāraṇavacanam iti/ yat pratyakṣajñānasya viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ tad ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:247: bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvān nokta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:249: yāvad arthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdās tair arthasampratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:250: arthasampratyayāc ca vyavahāraḥ/ tatredam indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannam arthajñānaṃ ``rūpam'' iti vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:252: rūparasaśabdāś ca viṣayanāmadheyam/ tena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ --- rūpam iti jānīte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:253: rasa iti jānīte/ nāmadheyaśabdena vyapadiśyamānaṃ sat śābdaṃ prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:258: gṛhīte 'pi ca śabdārthasambandhe 'syārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyam iti/ yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:260: tadā tat pūrvasmād arthajñānān na viśiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:261: tad arthavijñānaṃ tādṛg eva bhavati/ tasya tv arthajñānasyānyaḥ samākhyāśabdo nāstīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:262: yena pratīyamānaṃ vyavahārāya lakpeta/ na cāpratīyamānena vyavahāraḥ/ tasmāj jñeyasyārthasya saṃjñāśabdenetikaraṇayuktena nirdiśyate --- rūpam iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:263: rasa iti jñānam iti/ tad evam arthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:264: vyavahārakāle tu vyāpriyate/ tasmād aśābdam arthajñānam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:266: grīṣme marīcayo bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ spandamānā dūrasthasya cakṣuṣā sannikṛṣyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:269: tac ca pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata ity ata āha --- avyabhicārīti/ yad atasmiṃs tad iti tad vyabhicāri pratyakṣam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:271_0: dūrāc cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati dhūma iti vā reṇur iti vā / tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:271_1: etad indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata ity ata
GSP29nysvbh1u:271_2: āha --- vyavasāyātmakam iti / na caitan mantavyam --- ātmamanaḥsannikarṣajam evānavadhāraṇajñānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:271_3: iti / cakṣuṣā hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:272: % hy ayam arthaṃ paśyan nāvadhārayati,] p.122
GSP29nysvbh1u:274: evam indriyeṇānavadhārayan manasā nāvadhārayati/ yac ca tadindriyānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tad viśeṣāpekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:275: na pūrvam iti/ sarvatra pratyakṣaviṣaye jñātur indriyeṇa vyavasāyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:279: anindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ hi tad iti/ indriyasya vai sato manasa indriyebhyaḥ pṛthagupadeśo dharmabhedāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:284: nāsya saguṇasyendriyabhāva iti/ sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe sannidhim asannidhiṃ cāsya yugapajjñānānutpattikāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:286: manasaś cendriyabhāvān na vācyaṃ lakṣaṇāntaram iti/ tantrāntarasamācārāc caitat pratyetavyam iti/ paramatam apratiṣiddham anumatam iti hi tantrayuktiḥ/ vyākhyātaṃ pratyakṣam//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:290: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:292: tatpūrvakam ity anena liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhadarśanaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ cābhisambadhyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:294: liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambaddhayor darśanena liṅgasmṛtir abhisambadhyate/ smṛtyā liṅgadarśanena cāpratyakṣo 'rtho 'numīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:295: pūrvavad iti --- yatra kāraṇena kāryam anumīyate, yathā meghonnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:297: śeṣavat tad --- yatra kāryeṇa kāraṇam anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:298: pūrvodakaviparītam udakaṃ nadyāḥ pūrṇatvaṃ śīghratvañ ca dṛṣṭvā srotaso 'numīyate bhūtā vṛṣṭir iti/ sāmānyatodṛṣṭam --- vrajyāpūrvakam anyatra dṛṣṭasya ṇyatra darśanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:300: tathā cādityasya, tasmād asty apratyakṣāpy ādityasya vrajyeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:302: atha vā pūrvavad iti --- yatra yathāpūrvaṃ pratyakṣabhūtayor anyataradarśanenānyatarasyānumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:305: yathā dhūmenāgnir iti/ śeṣavan nāma pariśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:306: sa ca prasaktapratiṣedhe ṇyatrāprasaṅgāc chiṣyamāṇe sampratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:307: yathā sad anityam evamādinā dravyaguṇakarmaṇām aviśeṣeṇa sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyebhyo vibhaktasya śabdasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:313: yas tu śiṣyate so .yam iti śabdasya guṇatvapratipattiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:315: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma --- yatrāpratyakṣe liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandhe kenacid arthena liṅgasya sāmānyād apratyakṣo liṅgī gamyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:318: guṇāś ca dravyasaṃsthānāḥ, tad tad eṣāṃ sthānaṃ sa ātmeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:319_0: vibhāgavacanād eva trividham iti siddhe trividhavacanaṃ mahato mahāviṣayasya nyāyasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:319_1: laghīyasā sūtreṇopadeśāt paraṃ vākyalāghavaṃ manyamānasyānyasmin vākyalāghave 'nādaraḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:319_2: tathā cāyam itthaṃbhūtena vākyavikalpena pravṛttaḥ siddhānte chale śabdādiṣu ca bahulaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:321: sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam/ kasmāt?/ traikālyagrahaṇāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:327: asac ca khalv attam anāgataṃ ceti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:333: prajñātena sāmānyāt prajñāpanīyasya prajñāpanam upamānam iti/ yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:336: yadā khalv ayaṃ gavā samānadharmaṃ pratipadyate tadā pratyakṣatas tam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:337_0: samākhyāsambandhapratipattir upamānārtha ity āha / yathā gaur evaṃ gavaya ity upamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:337_1: prayukte gavā samānadharmam artham indriyārthasannikarṣād upalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabdaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:338: % gaur evaṃ gavaya ... pratipadyata iti] p.170
GSP29nysvbh1u:341: yathā māṣas tathā māṣaparṇīty upamāne prayukte upamānāt saṃjñāsaṃjñisanbandhaṃ pratipadyamānas tām oṣadhīṃ bhaiṣajyāyāharati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:343: evam anyo 'py upamānasya loke viṣayo bubhutsitavya iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:349: āptaḥ khalu sākṣātkṛtadharmā yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayukta upadeṣṭā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:351: sākṣātkaraṇam arthasyāptiḥ, tayā pravartata ity āptaḥ/ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāṃ samānaṃ lakṣaṇam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:353: tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vyavahārāḥ pravarttanta iti/ evam ebhiḥ pramāṇair devamanuṣyatiraścāṃ vyavahārāḥ prakalpante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:359: yasyeha dṛśyate 'rthaḥ sa dṛṣṭārthaḥ/ yasyāmutra pratīyate so 'dṛṣṭārthaḥ/ evam ṛṣilaukikavākyānāṃ vibhāga iti/ kimarthaṃ punar idam ucyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:360: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭārtha evāptopadeśaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:366: kiṃ punar anena pramāṇenārthajātaṃ pramātavyam iti? ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:369_0: tatrātmā sarvasya draṣṭā sarvasya bhoktā sarvajñaḥ sarvānubhāvī / tasya bhogāyatanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:369_1: śarīram / bhogasādhanānīndriyāṇi / bhoktavyā indriyārthāḥ / bhogo buddhiḥ / sarvārthopalabdhau
GSP29nysvbh1u:369_2: nendriyāṇi prabhavantīti sarvaviṣayam antaḥkaraṇaṃ manaḥ / śarīrendriyārthabuddhisukhavedanānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:370: doṣāś ca/ nāsyedaṃ śarīram apūrvam anuttaraṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:372: uttareṣām apavargo 'nta iti pretyabhāvaḥ/ sasādhanasukhaduḥkhopabhogaḥ phalam/ duḥkham iti nedam anukūlavedanīyasya sukhasya pratīteḥ pratyākhyānam/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:373: janmana evedaṃ sasukhasādhanasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgāt duḥkhenāviprayogād vividhabādhanāyogād duḥkham iti samādhibhāvanam upadiśyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:378: viraktasyāpavarga iti/ janmamaraṇaprabandhocchedaḥ sarvaduḥkhaprahāṇam apavarga iti/ asty anyad api dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ prameyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:380: asya tu tattvajñānād apavargo mithyājñānāt saṃsāra ity ata etad upadiṣṭaṃ viśeṣeṇeti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:384: tatrātmā tāvat pratyakṣato na gṛhyate/ sa kim āptopadeśamātrād eva pratipadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:385: nety ucyate/ anumānāc ca pratipattavya iti/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:390: seyam ādātum icchā ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānād bhavati liṅgam ātmanaḥ/ niyataviṣaye hi buddhibhedamātre na sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:391: dehāntaravad iti/ evam ekasyānekārthadarśino darśanapratisandhānāt duḥkhahetau dveṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:393_0: yajjātīyo 'syārthaḥ sukhahetuḥ prasiddhas tajjātīyam arthaṃ paśyann ādātuṃ prayatate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:393_1: ekam anekārthadarśinaṃ darśanapratisandhātāram antareṇa na syāt / niyataviṣaye buddhimātre na sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:394: dehāntaravad iti/ etena duḥkhahetau prayatno vyākhyātaḥ/ sukhaduḥkhasmṛtyā cāyaṃ tatsādhanam ādadānaḥ sukham upalabhate duḥkham upalabhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:395: sukhaduḥkhe vedayate/ pūrvokta eva hetuḥ/ bubhutsamānaḥ khalv ayaṃ vimṛśati kiṃsvid iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:397_0: tad idaṃ jñānaṃ bubhutsāvimarśābhyām abhinnakartṛkaṃ gṛhyamāṇam ātmaliṅgam / pūrvokta
GSP29nysvbh1u:397_1: eva hetur iti / tatra dehāntaravad iti vibhajyate yathānātmavādino dehāntareṣu niyataviṣayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:397_2: buddhibhedā na pratisandhīyante tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:398: % tathaikadehaviṣayā api na pratisandhīyeran, aviśeṣāt/] p.188
GSP29nysvbh1u:401: nādṛṣṭasyeti/ evaṃ khalu nānāsattvānāṃ samācāro 'nyadṛṣṭam anyo na smaratīti/ tad etad ubyayam aśakyam anātmavādinā vyavasthāpayitum ity evam upapannam asty ātmeti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:408: īpsitaṃ jihāsitaṃ vārtham adhikṛtyepsājihāsāprayuktasya tadupāyānuṣṭhānalakṣaṇā samīhā ceṣṭā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:412: yasyānugraheṇānugṛhītāni upaghāte copahatāni svaviṣayeṣu sādhvasādhuṣu vartante sa eṣām āśrayaḥ tac charīram/ katham arthāśrayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:413: % sa eṣām āśrayaḥ tac charīram/ katham arthāśrayaḥ/] p.195
GSP29nysvbh1u:414: yasminn āyatane indriyārthasannikarṣād utpannayoḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:415: % sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ pravartate sa eṣām āśrayaḥ,] p.196
GSP29nysvbh1u:422: jighraty aneneti ghrāṇaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti/ rasayaty aneneti rasanaṃ rasaṃ gṛhṇātīti/ caṣṭe 'neneti cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyatīti/ tvaksthānam indriyaṃ tvak/ tadupacāraḥ sthānād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:424: śṛṇoty aneneti śrotraṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti/ evaṃ samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyād bodhyaṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇānīndriyāṇīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:426: bhūtebhya iti/ nānāprakṛtīnām eṣāṃ satāṃ viṣayaniyamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:427: naikaprakṛtīnām/ sati ca viṣayaniyame svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavatīti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:432: NyS_1,1.13: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam iti bhūtāni ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:433: saṃjñāśabdaiḥ pṛthagupadeśo bhūtānāṃ vibhaktānāṃ suvacaṃ kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatīti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:439: pṛthivyādīnāṃ yathāviniyogaṃ guṇā indriyāṇāṃ yathākramam arthā viṣayā iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:443: acetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ vṛttiḥ cetanasyākartur upalabdhir iti yuktiviruddham arthaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka ivedam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:444: NyS_1,1.15: buddhir upalabdhir jñānam ity anarthāntaram ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:445: nācetanasya karaṇasya buddher jñānaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:453: smṛtyanumānāgamasaṃśayapratibhāsvapnajñānohāḥ sukhādipratyakṣam icchādayaś ca manaso liṅgāni/ teṣu satsv ayam api ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:455: anindriyanimittāḥ smṛtyādayaḥ karaṇāntaranimittā bhavitum arhantīti/ yugapac ca khalu ghrāṇādīnāṃ gandhādīnāṃ ca sannikarṣeṣu satsu yugapaj jñānāni notpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:458: asti tat tad indriyasaṃyogi sahakāri nimittāntaram avyāpi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:459: yasyāsannidher notpadyate jñānaṃ sannidheś cotpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:461: manaḥsaṃyogānapekṣasya hīndriyārthasannikarṣasya jñānahetutve yugapad uptadyeran jñānānīti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:468: budhyate 'neneti buddhiḥ/ so 'yam ārambhaḥ śarīreṇa vācā manasā ca puṇyaḥ pāpaś ca daśavidhaḥ/ tad etat kṛtabhāṣyaṃ dvitīyasūtra iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:474: jñātāraṃ hi rāgādayaḥ pravartayanti puṇye pāpe vā/ yatra mithyājñānaṃ tatra rāgadveṣāv iti/ pratyātmavedanīyā hīme doṣāḥ kasmāl lakṣaṇato nirdiśyanta iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:476: rakto hi tat karma kurute yena karmaṇā sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā labhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:477: tathā dviṣṭas tathā mūḍha iti/ rāgadveṣamohā ity ucyamāne bahu noktaṃ bhavatīti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:482_0: utpannasya kvacit sattvanikāye mṛtvā yā punarutpattiḥ sa pretyabhāvaḥ / utpannasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:482_2: punar dehādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ / punar ity abhyāsābhidhānam / yatra kvacit prāṇabhṛnnikāye
GSP29nysvbh1u:482_3: vartamānaḥ pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:483: % pūrvopāttān dehādīn jahāti tat praiti/] p.222
GSP29nysvbh1u:484: yat tatrānyatra vā dehādīn anyān upādatte tad bhavati/ pretyabhāvaḥ --- mṛtvā punarjanma,
GSP29nysvbh1u:485: so 'yaṃ janmamaraṇaprabandhābhyāso 'nādir apavargāntaḥ pretyabhāvo veditavya iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:489_0: sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanaṃ phalam / sukhavipākaṃ karma duḥkhavipākaṃ ca / tat punar dehendriyaviṣayabuddhiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:489_1: satīṣu bhavatīti saha dehādibhiḥ phalam abhipretam / tathā hi pravṛttidoṣajanito
GSP29nysvbh1u:490: % pravṛttidoṣajanito 'rthaḥ phalam etat sarvaṃ bhavati/] p.223
GSP29nysvbh1u:491: tad etat phalam upātam upātaṃ heyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:492: tyaktaṃ tyaktam upādeyam iti nāsya hānopādānayor niṣṭhā paryavasānaṃ vāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:493: sa khalv ayaṃ phalasya hānopādānasrotasohyate loka iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:499_0: bādhanā pīḍā tāpa iti / tayānuviddham anuṣaktam avinirbhāgena vartamānaṃ duḥkhayogād
GSP29nysvbh1u:499_1: duḥkham iti / so 'yaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhenānuviddham iti paśyan duḥkhaṃ jihāsur janmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:505: yatra tu niṣṭhā yatra tu paryavasānaṃ so .yam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:507: tena --- duḥkhena janmanā atyantaṃ vimuktir apavargaḥ/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:509: anyasya cānupādānam/ etām avasthām aparyantam apavargaṃ vedayante 'pavargavidaḥ/ tad abhayam ajaram amṛtyupadaṃ brahma kṣemaprāptir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:511: nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan mokṣe vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:512_0: yenābhivyaktenātyantaṃ vimuktaḥ sukhī bhātīti kecin manyante / teṣāṃ pramāṇābhāvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:512_1: anupapattiḥ / na pratyakṣaṃ nānumānaṃ nāgamo vā vidyate nityaṃ sukham ātmano mahattvavan
GSP29nysvbh1u:515: tasya hetur vācyo yatas tad utpadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:518: saṃsārasthasya muktenāviśeṣaḥ/ yathā muktaḥ sukhena tatsaṃvedanena ca sannityenopapannas tathā saṃsārastho 'pi prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:521: abhyanujñāne ca dharmādharmaphalena sāhacaryaṃ yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta/ yad idam utpattisthāneṣu dharmādharmaphalaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā saṃvedyate paryāyeṇa,
GSP29nysvbh1u:522: tasya ca nityasaṃvedanasya ca sahabhāvo yaugapadyaṃ gṛhyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:525: anityatve hetuvacanam/ atha mokṣe nityasya sukhasya saṃvedanam anityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:527: ātmamanaḥsaṃyogasya nimittāntarasahitasya hetutvam/ ātmamanaḥsaṃyogo hetur iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:528: evam api tasya sahakāri nimittāntaraṃ vacanīyam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:530: tasya hetur vācyo yataḥ utpadyata iti/ yogasamādhijasya kāryāvasāyavirodhāt prakṣaye saṃvedananivṛttiḥ/ yadi yogasamādhijo dharmo hetuḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:532: tasya kāryāvasāyavirodhāt prakṣaye saṃvedanam atyantaṃ nivartate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:533: asaṃvedane cāvidyamānenāviśeṣaḥ/ yadi dharmakṣayāt saṃvedanoparamo nityaṃ sukhaṃ na saṃvedyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:534: kiṃ vidyamānaṃ na saṃvedyate, athāvidyamānam iti nānumānaṃ viśiṣṭe 'stīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:535_0: aprakṣayaś ca dharmasya niranumānam utpattidharmakatvāt / yogasamādhijo dharmo na
GSP29nysvbh1u:535_1: kṣīyata iti nāsty anumānam / utpattidharmakam anityam iti viparyayasya tv anumānam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:535_2: yasya tu saṃvedanoparamo nāsti tena saṃvedanahetur nitya ity anumeyam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:536: nitye ca muktasaṃsārasthayor aviśeṣa ity uktam/ yathā muktasya nityaṃ sukhaṃ tatsaṃvedanahetuś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:539: tathā saṃsārasthasyāpīti/ evaṃ ca sati dharmādharmaphalena sukhaduḥkhasaṃvedanena sāhacaryaṃ gṛhyeteti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:543: syān matam --- saṃsārāvasthasya śarīrādisambandho nityasukhasaṃvedanahetoḥ pratibandhakaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:545: śarīrādayaḥ upabhogārthās te bhogapratibandhaṃ kariṣyantīty anupapannam;
GSP29nysvbh1u:546: na cāsty anumānam aśarīrasyātmano bhogaḥ kaścid astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:550: aniṣṭoparamārthatvāt/ idam anumānam --- iṣṭādhigamārtho mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:552: aniṣṭoparamārtho mokṣopadeśaḥ pravṛttiś ca mumukṣūṇām iti/ neṣṭam aniṣṭenānanuviddhaṃ sambhavatīti iṣṭam apy aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:555: dṛṣṭātikramaś ca dehādiṣu tulyaḥ/ yathā dṛṣṭam anityaṃ sukhaṃ parityajya nityaṃ sukhaṃ kāmayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:556: evaṃ dehendriyabuddhīr anityā dṛṣṭā atikramya muktasya nityā dehendriyabuddhayaḥ kalpayitavyāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:557: sādhīyaś caivaṃ muktasya caikātmyaṃ kalpitaṃ bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:559: samānam/ dehādīnāṃ nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ kalpayitum aśakyam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:560: samānaṃ sukhasyāpi nityatvaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ kalpayitum aśakyam iti/

GSP29nysvbh1u:663: niratiśayāś cetanāḥ dehendriyamanaḥsu viṣayeṣu tattatkāraṇeṣu ca viśeṣa iti sāṅkhyānām,

GSP29nysvbh1u:675: gandhādiguṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ guṇādhikaraṇam aniyataviṣayāś cetanā iti pūrvārthasiddhāv ete 'rhāḥ sidhyanti na tair vinā so 'rthaḥ sambhavatīti//30//

GSP29nysvbh1u:695: ayaṃ jijñāsate/ sā khalv ayam asādhanam arthasyeti/ jijñāsādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃśayaś ca vyāhatadharmopasaṅghātāt tattvajñāne pratyāsannaḥ,

GSP29nysvbh1u:697_0: sā śakyaprāptir na sādhakasya vākyasya bhāgena yujyate pratijñādivad iti / prayojanaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:697_1: tattvāvadhāraṇam arthasādhakasya vākyasya phalaṃ naikadeśa iti / saṃśayavyudāsaḥ

GSP29nysvbh1u:706: prajñāpanīyena dharmeṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanaṃ pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ anityaḥ śabda iti//33//
GSP29nysvbh1u:711: udāharaṇena sāmānyāt sādhyasya dharmasya sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ hetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:712: sādhye pratisandhāya dharmam udāharaṇe ca pratisandhāya tasya sādhanatāvacanaṃ hetuḥ utpattidharmakatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:719: kim etāvad dhetulakṣaṇam iti? nety ucyate/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:722: anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt, anutpattidharmakaṃ nityaṃ yathātmādidravyam iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:727: sādhyena sādharmyaṃ samānadharmatā/ sādhyasādharmyāt kāraṇāt taddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:730: tasya --- sādhyasya/ sādhyaṃ ca dvividhaṃ dharmiviśiṣṭo vā dharmaḥ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:731: dharmaviśiṣṭo vā dharmy anityaḥ śabda iti/ ihottaraṃ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyata iti/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:732: pṛthagdharmavacanāt/ tasya dharmas taddharmas tasya bhāvas taddharmabhāvaḥ sa yasmin dṛṣṭānte vartate sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyasādharmyād utpattidharmakatvat taddharmabhāvī bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:733_0: sa codāharaṇam iṣyate / tatra yad utpadyate tad utpattidharmakam / tac ca bhūtvā
GSP29nysvbh1u:733_1: na bhavati ātmānaṃ jahāti nirudhyata ity anityam / evam utpattidharmakatvaṃ sādhanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:735: so 'yam ekasmin dvayor dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sādharmyād vyavasthita upalabhyate,

GSP29nysvbh1u:741: dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam iti prakṛtam/ sādhyavaidharmyād ataddharmabhāvī dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇam iti/ anityaḥ śabda utpattidharmakatvāt anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam ātmādi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:742: so 'yam ātmādir dṛṭṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavaidharmyād anutpattidharmakatvād ataddharmabhāvī --- yo 'sau sādhyasya dharmo 'nityatvaṃ sa tasmin na bhavatīti/

GSP29nysvbh1u:748: tad idaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyam iti//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:752: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣas tathety upasaṃhāro na tatheti vā sādhyasyopanayaḥ ||

GSP29nysvbh1u:762: dvividhasya punar hetor dvividhasya codāharaṇasyopasaṃhāradvaite ca samānam ---

GSP29nysvbh1u:765_0: tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam --- nigamyante 'neneti pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:765_1: ekatreti nigamanam / nigamyante --- samarthyante --- sambadhyante / tatra sādharmokte
GSP29nysvbh1u:765_2: tāvad dhetau vākyam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñā / utpattidharmakatvād iti hetuḥ /

GSP29nysvbh1u:765_4: śabda ity upanayaḥ / tasmād utpattidharmakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti nigamanam / vaidharmyokte

GSP29nysvbh1u:777_8: dṛṣṭāntasthe gṛhyamāṇe sādhanabhūtasya dharmasya hetutvenopādānaṃ na sādharmyamātrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:782: ata ūrdhvaṃ tarko lakṣaṇīya ity athedam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:783: NyS_1,1.40: avijñātatattve 'rthe kāraṇopapattitas tattvajñānārtham ūhas tarkaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:784: avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe jijñāsā tāvaj jāyate jānīyemam artham iti/ atha jijñāsitasya vastuno vyāhatau dharmau vibhāgena vimṛśati ---

GSP29nysvbh1u:788_1: jijñāsā / sa kim utpattidharmako 'thānutpattidharmaka iti vimarśaḥ / vimṛśyamāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:788_2: 'vijñātatatte 'rthe yasya dharmasyābhyanujñākāraṇam upapadyate tam anujānāti / yady
GSP29nysvbh1u:789: tataḥ svakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalam anubhavati jñātā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:790: duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttaram uttaraṃ pūrvasya pūrvasya kāraṇam,

GSP29nysvbh1u:794: kathaṃ punar ayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tattvajñānam eveti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:795: anavadhāraṇāt/ anujānāty ayam ekataraṃ dharmaṃ kāraṇopapattyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:796: na tv avadhārayati na vyavasyati na niścinoti evam evedam iti/ kathaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:797: tattvajñānaviṣayābhyanujñālakṣaṇānugrahabhāvitāt prasannād anatarapramāṇasāmarthyāt tattvajñānam utpadyata ity evaṃ tattvajñānārtha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:798: so 'yaṃ tarkaḥ pramāṇāni pratisandadhānaḥ pramāṇābhyanujñānāt pramāṇasahito vāde 'padiṣṭa ity avijñātatattvam anujānāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:800: yathā so 'rho bhavati tasya tathābhāvaḥ tattvam, aviparyayo yāthātathyam//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:807_0: pratiṣedha upālambhaḥ / tau sādhanopālambhau pakṣapratipakṣāśrayau vyatiṣaktāv anubandhena
GSP29nysvbh1u:807_1: pravartamānau pakṣapratipakṣāv ity ucyete / tayor anyatarasya nivṛttir ekatarasyāvasthānam avaśyambhāvi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:809_0: nedaṃ pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ sambhavatīti --- eko hi pratijñātam arthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:809_1: hetutaḥ sthāpayati pratiṣiddhaṃ coddharati dvitīyasya / dvitīyena sthāpanāhetuḥ pratiṣidhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:812: ubhābhyām evārthāvadhāraṇam ity āha/ kayā yuktyā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:813_0: ekasya sambhavo dvitīyasyāsambhavaḥ / tāv etau sambhavāsambhavau vimarśaṃ saha nivarttayataḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:813_1: --- ubhayasambhave ubhayāsambhave vānivṛtto vimarśa iti / vimṛśyeti vimarśaṃ kṛtvā /
GSP29nysvbh1u:813_2: so 'yaṃ vimarśaḥ pakṣapratipakṣāv avadyotya nyāyaṃ pravartayatīty upādīyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:813_3: etac ca viruddhayor ekadharmisthayor boddhavyam / yatra tu dharmisāmānyagatau viruddhau
GSP29nysvbh1u:814: hetuto 'rthasya tathābhāvopapatteḥ/ yathā --- kriyāvad dravyam iti lakṣaṇavacane yasya dravyasya kriyāyogo hetutaḥ sambhavati tat kriyāvat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:815: yasya na sambhavati tad akriyam iti/ ekadharmisthayoś ca viruddhayor dharmayor ayugapadbhāvinoḥ kālavikalpaḥ/ yathā --- tad eva dravyaṃ kriyāyuktaṃ kriyāvat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:817: na cāyaṃ nirṇaye niyamo vimṛśyaiva pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇaya iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:819: parīkṣāviṣaye tu vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ/ vāde śāstre ca vimarśavarjam// 41 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:825: tisraḥ kathā bhavanti --- vādo jalpo vitaṇḍā ceti/ tāsām ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:829: ekādhikaraṇasthau viruddhau dharmau pakṣapratipakṣau pratyanīkabhāvāt, asty ātmā nāsty ātmeti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:832: yathā --- nitya ātmā anityā buddhir iti/ parigraho 'bhyupagamavyavasthā/ so 'yam pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ/ tasya viśeṣanaṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:833_0: pramāṇais tarkeṇa ca sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti / sādhanaṃ sthāpanā /
GSP29nysvbh1u:833_1: upālambhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ / tau sādhanopālambhāv ubhayor api pakṣayor vyatiṣaktāv anubaddhau
GSP29nysvbh1u:833_2: ca yāvad eko nivṛtta ekataro vyavasthita iti nivṛttasyopālambho vyavasthitasya sādhanam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:835: jalpe nigrahasthānaviniyogād vāde tatpratiṣedhaḥ/ pratiṣedhe kasyacid abhyanujñānārthaṃ siddhāntāviruddha iti vacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:837: ``siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddha'' iti hetvābhāsasya nigrahasthānasyābhyanujñā vāde/ pañcāvayavopapanna iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:839_0: ``hīnam anyatamenāpy avayavena nyūnam'' ``hetūdāharaṇādhikam adhikam'' iti caitayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:839_1: abhyanujñānārtham iti / avayaveṣu pramānatarkāntarbhāve pṛthak pramāṇatarkagrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:839_2: sādhanopālambhavyatiṣaṅgajñāpanārtham / anyathobhāv api pakṣau sthāpanāpravṛttau vāda iti syāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:841: antareṇāpi cāvayavasambandhaṃ pramāṇāny arthaṃ sādhayantīti dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:842: tenāpi kalpena sādhanopālambhau vāde bhavata iti jñāpayati/ ``chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambho jalpa'' iti vacanād vinigraho jalpa iti mā vijñāyi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:843: chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha eva jalpaḥ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambho vād eveti mā vijñāyīty evamarthaṃ pṛthak pramānatarkagrahaṇam iti// 1 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:849: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ/ chalajātinigrahasthānasādhanopālambha iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:850: chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanam upālambhaś cāsmin kriyata iti evaṃviśeṣaṇo jalpaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:852: na khalu vai chalajātinigrahasthānaiḥ sādhanaṃ kasyacid arthasya sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:855: viśeṣalakṣaṇeṣv api yathāsvam iti/ na caitad vijānīyāt pratiṣedhārthatayaivārthaṃ sādhayantīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:856: chalajātinigrahasthānopālambho jalpa ity evam apy ucyamāne vijñāyata etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:857_1: na svatantrāṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ --- yat tat pramāṇair arthasya sādhanaṃ tatra chalajātinigrahasthānānām
GSP29nysvbh1u:857_2: aṅgabhāvo rakṣaṇārthatvāt / tāni hi prayujyamānāni parapakṣavighātena svapakṣaṃ rakṣanti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:859_1: kaṇṭakaśākhāvaraṇavat'' iti / yaś cāsau pramāṇaiḥ pratipakṣasyopālambhas tasya caitāni
GSP29nysvbh1u:859_2: prayujyamānāni pratiṣedhavighātāt sahakārīṇi bhavanti / tad evam aṅgībhūtanāṃ chalādīnām upādānaṃ jalpe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:860: na svatantrāṇāṃ sādhanabhāvaḥ/ upālambhe tu svātantryam apy astīti// 2 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:866: pratipakṣasthāpanayā hīnaḥ/ yau tau samānādhikaraṇau viruddhau dharmau pakṣāv ity uktaṃ tayor ekataraṃ vaitaṇḍiko na sthāpayatīti prapakṣapratiṣedhenaiva pravartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:869: yad vai khalu tat parapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sa vaitaṇḍikasya pakṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:870: na tv asau sādhyaṃ kañcid arthaṃ pratijñāya sthāpayatīti/ tasmād yathānyāsam evāstv iti// 3 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:874: hetulakṣaṇābhāvād ahetavo hetusāmānyād dhetuvad ābhāsamānāḥ/ ta ime ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:882: vyabhicāra ekatrāvyavasthitiḥ/ sahavyabhicāreṇa vartata iti svayabhicāraḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:885: sparśavān kumbho 'nityo dṛṣṭaḥ na ca tathā sparśavān śabdas tasmād asparśatvān nityaḥ śabda iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:887: dṛṣṭānte sparśavattvam anityatvaṃ ca dharmau na sādhyasādhanabhūtau gṛhyete sparśavāṃś cāṇur nityaś ceti/ ātmādau ca dṛṣṭānte
GSP29nysvbh1u:889: ``udāharaṇasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetuḥ'' ity asparśatvād iti hetur nityatvaṃ vyabhicarati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:890: asparśā buddhir anityā ceti/ evaṃ dvividhe 'pi dṛṣṭānte vyabhicārāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo nāstīti lakṣaṇābhāvād ahetur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:891: nityatvam apy eko 'nto 'nityatvam apy eko ṇta ekasminn ante vidyata iti aikāntikaḥ viparyayād anaikāntika ubhayāntavyāpakatvād iti// 5 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:896: taṃ viruṇaddhīti tadvirodhy abhyupetaṃ siddhāntaṃ vyāhantīti/ yathā so 'yaṃ vikāro vyakter apaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:898: na nityo vikāra upapadyata apeto 'pi vikāro 'sti vināśapratiṣedhāt/ so 'yaṃ nityatvapratiṣedhād iti/ hetur vyakter apeto 'pi vikāro 'stīty anena svasiddhāntena virudhyate/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:899_0: vyaktir ātmalābhaḥ / apāyaḥ pracyutiḥ / yady ātmalābhāt pracyuto vikāro 'sti nityatvapratiṣedho
GSP29nysvbh1u:899_1: nopapadyate / yad vyakter apetasyāpi vikārasyāstitvaṃ tat khalu nityatvam iti / nityatvapratiṣedho
GSP29nysvbh1u:901: yad ātmalābhāt pracyavate tad anityaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:902_0: yad asti na tad ātmalābhāt pracyavate / astitvaṃ cātmalābhāt pracyutir iti ca viruddhāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:902_1: etau dharmau na saha sambhavata iti / so 'yaṃ hetur yaṃ siddhāntam āśritya pravartate
GSP29nysvbh1u:906: NyS_1,2.7: yasmāt prakaraṇacintā sa nirṇayārtham apadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:908: tasya cintā vimarśāt prabhṛti prāṅ nirṇayād yat samīkṣaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:910: sā jijñāsā yatkṛtā sa nirṇayārthaṃ prayukta ubhayapakṣasāmyāt prakaraṇam anativartamānaḥ prakaraṇasamo nirṇayāya na prakalpate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:911: prajñāpanaṃ tv anityaḥ śabdo nityadharmānupalabdher iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:912: anupalabhyamānan ity adharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam sthālyādi/ nityaḥ śabdo vānityadharmānupalabdheḥ anupalabhyamānānityadharmakaṃ nityaṃ dṛṣṭam ākāśādi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:913: yatra samāno dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ hetutvenopādīyate sa saṃśayasamaḥ savyabhicāra eva/
GSP29nysvbh1u:915_0: yā tu vimarśasya viśeṣāpekṣitā ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiś ca sā prakaraṇaṃ pravartayati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:915_1: yathā śabde nityadharmo nopalabhyata evam anityadharmo 'pi / seyam ubhayapakṣaviśeṣānupalabdhiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:918: viparyaye hi prakaraṇanivṛtteḥ --- yadi nityadharmaḥ śabde gṛhyeta na syāt prakaraṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:920: yadi vānityadharmo gṛhyeta evam api nivarteta prakaraṇam/ so 'yaṃ hetur ubhau pakṣau pravartayann anyatarasya nirṇayāya na prakalpate// 7 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:925: dravyaṃ chāyeti sādhyam, gatimattvād iti hetuḥ sādhyenāviśiṣṭaḥ sādhanīyatvāt sādhyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:927_0: ayam apy asiddhatvāt sādhyavat prajñāpayitavyaḥ / sādhyaṃ tāvad etat kiṃ puruṣavac
GSP29nysvbh1u:927_1: chāyāpi gacchaty āhosvid āvarakadravye saṃsarpaty āvaraṇasantānād asannidhisantāno
GSP29nysvbh1u:929: sarpatā khalu dravyeṇa yo yas tejobhāga āvriyate tasya tasyāsannidhir evāvicchinno gṛhyata iti/ āvaraṇaṃ tu prāptipratiṣedhaḥ// 8 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:934: kālātyayena yukto yasyārthaikadeśo 'padiśyamānasya sa kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ kālātīta ity ucyate/ nidarśanam --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ saṃyogavyaṅgyatvād rūpavat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:936: prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca vyakter avasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:937: tathā ca śabdo 'py avasthito bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena vyajyate dāruparaśusaṃyogena vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:939: ayam ahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt/ vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktir atyeti/ sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:940: na nivṛtte saṃyoge rūpaṃ gṛhyate/ nivṛtte dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle/ seyaṃ śabdasya vyaktiḥ saṃyogakālam atyetīti na saṃyoganirmitā bhavati/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:941: kāraṇābhāvād dhi kāryābhāva iti/ evam udāharaṇasādharmyasyābhāvād asādhanam ayaṃ hetur hetvābhāsa iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:946: ity etadvacanād viparyāsenokto hetur udāharaṇasādharmyāt tathā vaidharmyāt sādhyasādhanaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na jahāti/ ajahaddhetulakṣaṇaṃ na hetvābhāso bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:955: na sāmānyalakṣaṇe chalaṃ śakyam udāhartum, vibhāge tūdāharaṇāni// 10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:960: NyS_1,2.11 : tat trividhaṃ vākchalaṃ sāmānyacchalam upacāracchalam ceti ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:964: NyS_1,2.12 : aviśeṣābhihite 'rthe vaktur abhiprāyād arthāntarakalpanā vākchalam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:965: navakambalo 'yaṃ māṇavaka iti prayogaḥ/ atra navaḥ kambalo 'syeti vaktur abhiprāyaḥ/ vigrahe tu viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:966: na samāse/ tatrāyaṃ chalavādī vaktur abhiprāyād avivakṣitam anyam arthaṃ nava kambalā asyeti tāvad abhihitaṃ bhavateti kalpayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:968: kalpayitvā cāsambhavena pratiṣedhati eko 'sya kambalaḥ kuto nava kambalā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:969: tad idaṃ sāmānyaśabde vāci chalaṃ vākchalam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:970: asya pratyavasthānam --- sāmānyaśabdasyānekārthatve 'nyatarābhidhānakalpanāyāṃ viśeṣavacanam/ navakambala ity anekārthābhidhānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:972: etasmin prayukte yeyaṃ kalpanā nava kambalā asyety etadbhavatābhihitaṃ tac ca na sambhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:973: etasyām anyatarābhidhānakalpanāyāṃ viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ/ yasmād viśeṣo 'rthaviśeṣeṣu vijñāyate 'yam artho 'nenābhihita iti/ sa ca viśeṣo nāsti/ tasmān mithyābhiyogamātram etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:974: prasiddhaś ca loke śabdārthasambandho 'bhidhānābhidheyaniyamaniyogaḥ/ asyābhidhānasyāyam artho 'bhidheya iti samānaḥ sāmānyaśabdasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:975: viśeṣo viśiṣṭaśabdasya/ prayuktapūrvāś ceme śabdā arthe prayujyante nāprayuktapūrvāḥ/ prayogaś cārthasampratyayārthaḥ/ arthapratyayāc ca vyavahāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:977_0: tatraivam arthagatyarthe śabdaprayoge sāmarthyāt sāmānyaśabdasya prayoganiyamaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:977_1: ajāṃ grāmaṃ naya sarpir āhāra brāhmaṇaṃ bhojayeti sāmānyaśabdāḥ santo 'rthāvayaveṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:979: kriyādeśanāsambhavāt/ evam ayaṃ sāmānyaśabdo navakambala iti yo 'rthaḥ sambhavati navaḥ kambalo 'syeti tatra pravartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:980: yas tu na sambhavait nava kambalā asyeti tatra na pravartate/ so 'yam anupapadyamānārthakalpanayā paravākyopālambho na kalpata iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:985: aho khalv asau brāhmaṇo vidyācaraṇasampanna ity ukte kaścid āha sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:987: asya vacanasya vighāto 'rthavikalpopapattyāsambhūtārthakalpanayā kriyate --- yadi brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṃasampat sambhavati vrātye 'pi sambhavet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:989_0: so 'py astu vidyācaraṇasampanna iti / yad vivakṣitam artham āpnoti cātyeti ca tad
GSP29nysvbh1u:989_1: atisāmānyam / yathā brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidyācaraṇasampadaṃ kvacid āpnoti kvacid atyeti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:990: asya ca pratyavasthānam --- avivakṣitahetukasya viṣayānuvādaḥ praśaṃsārthatvād vākyasya;
GSP29nysvbh1u:991: tad atrāsambhūtārthakalpanānupapattiḥ/ yathā sambhavanty asmin kṣetre śālaya iti anirākṛtam avivakṣitaṃ ca bījajanma,
GSP29nysvbh1u:993: so 'yaṃ kṣetrānuvādaḥ nāsmin śālayo vidhīyanta iti;
GSP29nysvbh1u:994_0: bījāt tu śālinirvṛttiḥ satī na vivakṣitā / evaṃ sambhavati brāhmaṇe vidyācaraṇasampad
GSP29nysvbh1u:994_1: iti sampadviṣayo brāhmaṇatvaṃ na sampaddhetuḥ / na cātra hetur vivakṣitaḥ / viṣayānuvādas
GSP29nysvbh1u:995_0: sati brāhmaṇatve sampaddhetuḥ samartha iti / vis'yaṃ ca praśaṃsatā vākyena yathāhetutaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:995_1: phalanirvṛttir na pratyākhyāyate / tad evaṃ sati vacanavighāto 'sambhūtārthakalpanayā nopapadyata iti //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1002: tasya nirdeśe dharmavikalpanirdeśe/ yathā mañcāḥ krośantīti arthasadbhāvena pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1004: mañcasthāḥ puruṣāḥ krośanti na tu mañcāḥ krośanti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1007: bhaktyā prayoge prādhānyena kalpanam upacāraviṣayaṃ chalam upacāracchalam/ upacāro nītārthaḥ sahacaraṇādinimittena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1009_0: atra samādhiḥ --- prasiddhe prayoge vaktur yathābhiprāyaṃ śabdārthayor abhyanujñā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1009_1: pratiṣedhā vā na cchandataḥ / pradhānabhūtasya śabdasya bhāktasya ca guṇabhūtasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1009_2: prayoga ubhayor lokasiddhaḥ / siddhe prayoge yathā vaktur abhiprāyas tathā śabdārthāv
GSP29nysvbh1u:1009_3: anujñeyau pratiṣedhyau vā na cchandataḥ / yadi vaktā pradhānaśabdaṃ prayuṅkte yathābhūtasyābhyanujñā pratiṣedho vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1011: tadā guṇabhūtasya/ yatra tu vaktā guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prayuṅkte pradhānabhūtam abhipretya paraḥ pratiṣedhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1012: svamanīṣayā pratiṣedho 'sau bhavati na paropālambha iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1017: na vākchalād upacāracchalaṃ bhidyate tasyāpy arthāntarakalpanāyā aviśeṣāt/ ihāpi sthānyartho guṇaśabdaḥ pradhānaśabdaḥ sthānārtha iti kalpayitvā pratiṣidhyata iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1023: arthāntarakalpanātaḥ/ anyā hy arthāntarakalpanā, anyo 'rthasadbhāvapratiṣedha iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1027: NyS_1,2.17 : aviṣeṣe vā kiñcit sādharmyād ekacchalaprasaṅaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1028: chalasya dvitvam abhyanujñāya tritvaṃ pratiṣidhyate kiñcit sādharmyāt/ yathā cāyaṃ hetus tritvaṃ pratiṣedhati tathā dvitvam apy abhyanujñātaṃ pratiṣedhati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1029: vidyate hi kiñcit sādharmyaṃ dvayor apīti/ atha dvitvaṃ kiñcitsādharmyān na nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1035: prayukte hi hetau yaḥ prasaṅgo jāyate sa jātiḥ/ sa ca prasaṅgaḥ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānam upālambhaḥ pratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1044_0: viparītā vā kutsitā vā pratipattir vipratipattiḥ / vipratipadyamānaḥ parājayaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1044_1: nigrahasthānaṃ khalu parājayaprāptiḥ / apratipattis tv ārambhaviṣaye anārambhaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1044_2: pareṇa sthāpitaṃ vā na pratiṣedhati pratiṣedhaṃ vā noddharati / asamāsāc ca naite
GSP29nysvbh1u:1048: kiṃ punar dṛṣṭāntavaj jātinigrahasthānayor abhedo 'tha siddhāntavad bheda ity ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1051: tayoś ca vipratipattyapratipattyor vikalpān nigrahasthānabahutvam/ nānā kalpo vikalpaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1052: vividho vā kalpo vikalpaḥ/ tatra ananubhāṣaṇam ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam ity apratipattir nigrasthānam/ śeṣas tu vipratipattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1056: yathālakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣiṣyanta iti trividhā cāsya śāstrasya pravṛttir veditavyeti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1057: iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyam āhnikam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1062: ata ūrdhvaṃ pramāṇādiparīkṣā/ sā ca ``vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyām arthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ'' ity agre vimarṣa eva parīkṣyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1063: NyS_2,1.1 : samānānekadharmādhyavasāyād anyataradharmādhyavasāyād vā na saṃśayaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1064: samānasya dharmasyādhyavasāyāt saṃśayo na dharmamātrāt/ atha vā samānam anayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1066: atha vā samānadharmādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte dharmiṇi saṃśayo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1067_0: na jātu rūpasyārthāntarabhūtasyādhyavasāyād arthāntarabhūte sparśe saṃśaya iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1067_1: atha vā na adhyavasāyād arthāvadhāraṇād anavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya upapadyate kāryakāraṇayoḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1067_2: sārūpyābhāvād iti / etenānekadharmādhyavasāyād iti vyākhyātam / anyataradharmādhyvasāyāc
GSP29nysvbh1u:1073: na vipratipattimātrād avyavasthāmātrād vā saṃśayaḥ/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1074_0: vipratipattim upalabhamānasya saṃśayaḥ / evam avyavasthāyām apīti / atha vāsty ātmety
GSP29nysvbh1u:1074_1: eke nāsty ātmety apare manyanta ity upalabdheḥ kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ syād iti / tathopalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1074_2: avyavasthitā anupalabdhiś cāvyavasthiteti vibhāgenādhyavasite saṃśayo nopapadyata iti //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1078: yāṃ ca vipratipattiṃ bhavān saṃśayahetuḥ manyate sā sampratipattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1079: sā hi dvayoḥ pratyanīkadharmaviṣayā/ tatra yadi vipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1085: na saṃśayaḥ/ yadi tāvad iyam avyavasthā ātmani eva vyavasthitā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1086: vyavasthānād avyavasthā na bhavatīty anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1087: atha avyavasthātmani na vyavasthitā, evam atādātmyād avyavasthā na bhavatīti saṃśayābhāva iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1091: yena kalpena bhavān samānadharmopapatteḥ saṃśaya iti manyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1092: tena khalv atyantasaṃśayaḥ prasajyate/ samānadharmopapatter anucchedāt saṃśayānucchedaḥ/ na hy ayam ataddharmā dharmī vimṛśyamāṇo gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1098: NyS_2,1.6 : yathoktādhyavasāyād eva tadaviśeṣāpekṣāt saṃśaye nāsaṃśayo nātyantasaṃśayo vā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1099: na saṃśayānutpattiḥ saṃśayānucchedaś ca prasajyate/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1100: yat tāvat samānadharmādhyavasāyaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ na samānadharmamātram iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1101: evam etat/ kasmād evaṃ nocyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1102: viśeṣāpekṣa iti vacanāt tatsiddheḥ --- viśeṣasyāpekṣā ākaṅkṣā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1104: na coktaṃ samānadharmāpekṣa iti/ samāne ca dharme katham ākaṅkṣā na bhaved yady ayaṃ pratyakṣaḥ syāt/ etena sāmarthyena vijñāyate samānadharmādhyavasāyād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1105: upapattivacanād vā --- samānadharmopapatter ity ucyate na cānyā sadbhāvasaṃvedanād ṛte samānadharmopapattir asti/ anupalabhyamānasadbhāvo hi samāno dharmo 'vidyamānavad bhavatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1106: viṣayaśabdena vā viṣayiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānam --- yathā loke dhūmenāgnir anumīyate ity ukte dhūmadarśanenāgnir anumīyata iti jñāyate/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1107: dṛṣṭvā hi dhūmam athāgnim anuminoti nādṛṣṭveti; na ca vākye darśanaśabdaḥ śrūyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1109: tena manyāmahe viṣayaśabdena viṣayiṇaḥ pratyayasyābhidhānaṃ boddhānujānāti/ evam ihāpi samānadharmaśabdena samānadharmādhyvasāyam āheti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1111: yathohitvā samānamanayor dharmam upalabha iti dharmadharmigrahaṇe saṃśayābhāva iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1112: pūrvadṛṣṭaviṣayam etat/ yāv aham arthau pūrvam adrākṣaṃ tayoḥ samānaṃ dharmam upalabhe viśeṣaṃ nopalabha iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1113: kathaṃ nu viśeṣaṃ paśyeyaṃ yenānyataram avadhārayeyam iti/ na caitat samānadharmopalabdhau dharmadharmigrahaṇamātreṇa nivartata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1114: yac coktaṃ nārthāntarādhyavasāyād anyatra saṃśaya iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1115: yo hy arthāntarādhyavasāyamātraṃ saṃśayahetum upādadīta sa evaṃ vācya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1116: yat punar etat kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyābhāvād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1117: kāraṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ kāryasya bhāvābhāvau kāryakāraṇayoḥ sārūpyam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1119: yasyotpādād yad utpadyate yasya cānutpādād yan notpadyate tat kāraṇaṃ kāryam itarad ity etat sārūpyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1120: asti ca saṃśayakāraṇe saṃśaye caitad iti/ etenānekadharmādhyavasāyād iti pratiṣedhaḥ parihṛta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1121: yat punar etad uktaṃ ``vipratipattyavyavasthādhyavasāyāc ca na saṃśaya'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1122: pṛthakpravādayor vyāhatam artham upalabhe viśeṣaṃ ca na jānāmi nopalabhe yenānyataram avadhārayeyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1124_0: tat ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ syād yenaikataram avadhārayeyam iti saṃśayo vipratipattijanito
GSP29nysvbh1u:1124_1: 'yaṃ na śakyo vipratipattisampratipattimātreṇa nivartayitum iti /evam upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthākṛte
GSP29nysvbh1u:1125: yat punar etat vipratipattau ca sampratipatter iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126_0: vipratipattiśabdasya yo 'rthaḥ tadadhyavasāyo viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetus tasya ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126_1: samākhyāntareṇa na nivṛttiḥ / samāne 'dhikaraṇe vyāhatārthau pravādau vipratipattiśabdasyārthaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126_2: tadadhyavasāyaś ca viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśayahetuḥ / na cāsya sampratipattiśabde samākhyāntare
GSP29nysvbh1u:1126_3: yojyamāne saṃśayahetutuvaṃ nivartate / tad idam akṛtabuddhisammohanam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1128_0: saṃśayahetor arthasyāpratiṣedhād avyavasthābhyanujñānāc ca nimittāntareṇa śabdāntarakalpanā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1128_1: vyarthā / śabdāntarakalpanāvyavasthā khalv avyavasthā na bhavaty avyavasthātmani
GSP29nysvbh1u:1130: nānayor upalabdhyanupalabdhyoḥ sadasadviṣayatvaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ saṃśayahetur na bhvatīti pratiṣidhyate yāvatā cāvyavasthātmani vyavasthitā na tāvatātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1131: tāvatā hy anujñātāvyavasthā/ evam iyaṃ kriyamāṇāpi śabdāntarakalpanā nārthāntaraṃ sādhayatīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1133: nāyaṃ samānadharmādibhya eva saṃśayaḥ/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1134: tadviṣayādhyavasāyād viśeṣasmṛtisahitād ity ato nātyantasaṃśaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1137: viśeṣāpekṣo vimarṣaḥ saṃśaya iti vacanāt/ viśeṣaś cānyataradharmo na tasminn adhyvasīyamāne viśeṣāpekṣā sambhavatīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1142: yatra yatra saṃśayapūrvikā parīkṣā śāstre kathāyāṃ vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1143: tatra tatraivaṃ saṃśaye pareṇa pratiṣiddhe samādhir vācya iti/ ataḥ sarvaparīkṣāvyāpitvāt prathamaṃ saṃśayaḥ parīkṣita iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1149: pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ nāsti traikālyāsiddheḥ pūrvāparasahabhāvānupapatter ity arthaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1154: NyS_2,1.9 : pūrvaṃ hi pramāṇasiddhau nendriyārthasannikarṣāt pratyakṣotpattiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1161: NyS_2,1.10 : paścāt siddhau na pramāṇebhyaḥ prameyasiddhiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1162: asati pramāṇe kena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyaḥ syāt pramāṇena khalu pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam ity etat sidhyati//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168_0: evam api gandhādiṣv indriyārtheṣu jñānāni pratyarthaniyatāni yugapatsambhavantīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168_1: jñānānāṃ pratyakṣaniyatatvāt kramavṛttitvābhāvaḥ / yā imā buddhayaḥ krameṇārtheṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168_2: varttante tāsāṃ kramavṛttitvaṃ na sambhavatīti / vyāghātaś ca ``yugapaj jñānānutpattir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168_3: manaso liṅgam'' iti / etāvāṃś ca pramāṇaprameyayoḥ sadbhāvaviṣayaḥ sa cānupapanna
GSP29nysvbh1u:1168_4: iti / tasmāt pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvaṃ na sambhavatīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1169: asya samādhiḥ --- upalabdhihetor upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1173: yathādityasya prakāśa utpadyamānānām/ kvacit pūrvam upalabdhiviṣayaḥ paścād upalabdhihetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1174: yathāvasthitānāṃ pradīpaḥ/ kvacid upalabdhihetur upalabdhiviṣayaś ca saha bhvataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1175_0: yathā dhūmenāgner grahaṇam iti / upalabdhihetuś ca pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ tūpalabdhiviṣayaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1175_1: evaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoḥ pūrvāparasahabhāve 'niyate yathārtho dṛśyate tathā vibhajya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1176: sāmānyena khalu vibhajya pratiṣedha ukta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1177: samākhyāhetos traikālyayogāt tathābhūtā samākhyā/ yat punar idaṃ paścāt siddhāv asati pramāṇe prameyaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1178: pramāṇena pramīyamāṇo 'rthaḥ prameyam iti vijñāyata iti/ pramāṇam ity etasyāḥ samākhyāyā upalabdhihetutvaṃ nimittam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1182: upalabdhiṃ kariṣyatīti samākhyāhetos traikālyayogāt samākhyā tathābhūtā pramito 'nenārthaḥ pramīyate pramāsyata iti pramāṇam; pramitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1184: pramāsyate iti ca prameyam/ evaṃ sati bhaviṣyaty asmin hetuta upalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1185_0: pramāsyate 'yam arthaḥ prameyam idam ity etat sarvaṃ bhvatīti / traikālyānabhyanujñāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:1185_1: ca vyavahārānupapattiḥ / yaś caivaṃ nābhyanujānīyāt tasya pācakam ānaya pakṣyati
GSP29nysvbh1u:1185_2: lāvakam ānaya laviṣyatīti vyavahāro nopapadyata iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1186: ``pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyaṃ traikālyāsiddher'' ity evamādi vākyaṃ pramāṇapratiṣedhaḥ/ tatrāyaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1187: athānena pratiṣedhena bhavatā kiṃ kriyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1188: kiṃ sambhavo nivartyate athāsambhavo jñāpyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1190: tad yadi sambhavo nivartyate sati sambhave pratyakṣādīnāṃ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ/ athāsambhavo jñāpyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1191: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāptas tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ pramāṇāsambhavasyopalabdhihetutvād iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1196_0: asya tu vibhāgaḥ / pūrvaṃ hi pratiṣedhasiddhāv asati pratiṣedhye kim anena pratiṣidhyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1196_1: paścāt siddhau pratiṣedhyāsiddhiḥ pratiṣedhābhāvād iti / yugapatsiddhau pratiṣedhyasiddhyabhyanujñānād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1198: pratiṣedhalakṣaṇe ca vākye 'nupapadyamāne siddhaṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇatvam iti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1204: traikālyāsiddher ity asya hetor yady udāharaṇam upādīyate hetvarthasya sādhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte darśayitavyam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1206: na ca tarhi pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyam/ atha pratyakṣādīnām aprāmāṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1207: upādīyamānam apy udāharaṇaṃ nārthaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti so 'yaṃ sarvapramāṇavyāhato hetur ahetuḥ;
GSP29nysvbh1u:1208_0: ``siddhāntam abhyupetya tadvirodhī viruddhaḥ'' iti / vākyārtho hy asya siddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1208_1: sa ca vākyārthaḥ pratyakṣādīni nārthaṃ sādhayantītīdaṃ cāvayavānām upādānam arthasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1208_2: sādhanāyeti / atha nopādīyate apradarśitaṃ hetvarthasya dṛṣṭāntena sādhakatvam iti

GSP29nysvbh1u:1213_1: paravākye 'py avayavāśritānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prasajyate 'viśeṣād iti / evaṃ ca na sarvāṇi
GSP29nysvbh1u:1213_2: pramāṇāni pratiṣidhyanta iti / vipratiṣedha iti vīty ayam upasargaḥ sampratipattyarthe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1218: NyS_2,1.15 : traikālyāpratiṣedhaś ca śabdād ātodyasiddhivat tatsiddheḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1220: pūrvoktanibandhanārtham/ yat tāvat pūrvoktam upalabdhihetor upalabdhiviṣayasya cārthasya pūrvāparasahabhāvāniyamād yathādarśanaṃ vibhāgavacanam iti,

GSP29nysvbh1u:1221_1: pratyācaṣṭe --- traikālyasya cāyuktaḥ pratiṣedha iti / tatraikāṃ vidhām udāharati

GSP29nysvbh1u:1225: antarhite hy ātodye svanato 'numānaṃ bhavatīti vīṇā vādyate veṇuḥ pūryate iti svanaviśeṣeṇa ātodyaviśeṣaṃ pratipadyate;

GSP29nysvbh1u:1234_1: tūpalabdhisādhanaṃ pramāṇam upalabdhiviṣayaś ca prameyam iti / yadā ca upalabdhiviṣayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1234_2: kvacid upalabdhisādhanaṃ bhavati tadā pramāṇaṃ prameyam iti caiko 'rtho 'bhidhīyate /

GSP29nysvbh1u:1475: yady avayavī nāsti sarvasya grahaṇaṃ nopapadyate/ kiṃ tat sarvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1477: paramāṇusamavasthānaṃ tāvad darśanaviṣayo na bhavaty atīndriyatvād aṇūnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1479: darśanaviṣayasthāś ceme dravyādayo gṛhante te niradhiṣṭhānā na gṛhyeran/ gṛhyante tu kumbho 'yaṃ śyāma eko mahān saṃyuktaḥ spandate asti mṛnmayaś ceti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1480: santi ceme guṇādayo dharmā iti/ tena sarvasya grahaṇāt paśyāmo 'sti dravyāntarabhūto .vayavīti//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1486: saṅgrahakārite vai dhāraṇākarṣaṇe/ saṃgraho nāma saṃyogasahacaritaṃ guṇāntaraṃ snehadravatvakāritam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1488: agnisaṃyogāt pakve/ yadi tv avayavikārite abhaviṣyatāṃ pāṃśurāśiprabhṛtiśv apy ajñāsyetām/ dravyāntarānutpattau ca tṛṇopalakāṣṭhādiṣu jatusaṃgṛhīteṣv api nābhāviṣyatām iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1490_0: athāvayavinaṃ pratyācakṣāṇako mā bhūt pratyakṣalopa ity aṇusañcayaṃ darśanaviṣayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1490_1: pratijānānaḥ kim anuyoktavya iti / ekam idaṃ dravyam ity ekavuddher viṣayaṃ paryanuyojyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1490_2: --- kim ekabuddhir abhinnārthaviṣayeti āhosvit bhinnārthaviṣayeti / abhinnārthaviṣayeti cet ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1492: arthāntarānujñānād avayavavisiddhiḥ/ nānārthaviṣayeti cet --- bhinneṣv ekadarśanānupapattiḥ anekasminn eka iti vyāhatā buddhir na dṛśyata iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1495: NyS_2,1.36: senāvanavat grahaṇam iti cen nātīndriyatvād aṇūnām ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1496_0: yathā senāṅgeṣu vanāṅgeṣu ca dūrād agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1496_1: buddhiḥ evam aṇuṣu sañciteṣv agṛhyamāṇapṛthaktveṣv ekam idam ity upapadyate buddhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:1496_2: iti / yathā gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ senāvanāṅgānām ārāt kāraṇāntarataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1498: yathā gṛhyamāṇajātīnāṃ palāśa iti vā khadira iti vā nārāj jātigrahaṇaṃ bhavati/ yathā gṛhyamāṇapraspandānāṃ nārāt spandagrahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1499: gṛhyamāṇe cārthajāte pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād ekam iti bhāktaḥ pratyayo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1500: na tv aṇūnāṃ gṛhyamāṇapṛthaktvānāṃ kāraṇataḥ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād bhākta ekapratyayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1503: idam eva ca parīkṣyate kim ekapratyayo ṇusañcayaviṣaya āhosvit neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1504: aṇusañcaya eva senāvanāṅāni/ na ca parīkṣyamāṇam udāharaṇam iti yuktaṃ sādhyatvād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1505: dṛṣṭam iti cen na tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ/ yad api manyeta dṛṣṭam idaṃ senāvanāṅgānāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1506: na ca dṛṣṭaṃ śakyaṃ pratyākhyātum iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1508: tadviṣayasya parīkṣopapatteḥ --- darśanaviṣaya evāyaṃ parīkṣyate yo 'yam ekam iti pratyayo dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1509_0: sa parīkṣyate kiṃ dravyāntaraviṣayo vā athāṇusañcayaviṣaya iti / atra darśanam anyatarasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:1509_1: sādhakaṃ na bhavati / nānābhāve cāṇūnāṃ pṛthaktvasyāgrahaṇād abhedenaikam iti grahaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1510: yathā sthāṇau puruṣa iti/ tataḥ kim?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1512: atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhiḥ/ sthāṇau puruṣa iti pratyayasya kiṃ pradhānam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1514_0: tasmin sati puruṣasāmānyagrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣo .yam iti / evaṃ nānābhūteṣv ekam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1514_1: iti sāmānyagrahaṇāt pradhāne sati bhavitum arhati / pradhānaṃ ca sarvasyāgrahaṇād
GSP29nysvbh1u:1514_2: iti nopapadyate / tasmād abhinna evāyam abhedapratyaya ekam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1517_0: na viśeṣahetvabhāvād dṛṣṭāntāvyavasthā --- śrotrādiviṣayeṣu śabdādiṣv abhinneṣv ekapratyayaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1517_1: pradhānam anekasminn ekapratyayasyeti / evaṃ ca sati dṛṣṭāntopādānaṃ na vyavatiṣṭhate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1517_2: viśeṣahetvabhāvāt / aṇuṣu saṃśiteṣv ekapratyayaḥ kim atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ sthāṇau puruṣapratyayavat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1518_0: athārthasya tathābhāvāt tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayaḥ yathā śabdasyaikatvād ekaḥ śabda
GSP29nysvbh1u:1518_1: iti viśeṣahetuparigrahaṇam antareṇa dṛṣṭāntau saṃśayam āpādayata iti / kumbhavatsañcayamātraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1520: evaṃ parimāṇasaṃyogaspandajātiviśeṣapratyayān apy anuyoktavyaḥ, teṣu caivaṃ prasaṅga iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1521_0: ekatvabuddhis tasmiṃs tad iti pratyaya iti viśeṣahetur mahad iti pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:1521_1: --- ekam idaṃ mahac ceti ekaviṣayau pratyayau samānādhikaraṇau bhavataḥ tena vijñāyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1521_2: yan mahat tad ekam iti / aṇusamūhātiśayagrahaṇaṃ mahatpratyaya iti cet so .yam amahatsu
GSP29nysvbh1u:1521_3: aṇuṣu mahatpratyayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti pratyayo bhavatīti / kiṃ cātaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1522: atasmiṃs tad iti pratyayasya pradhānāpekṣitvāt pradhānasiddhir iti bhavitavyaṃ mahaty eva mahatpratyayeneti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1524: aṇuḥ śabdo mahān iti ca vyavasāyāt pradhānasiddhir iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1525: na mandatīvratāgrahaṇam iyattānavadhāraṇāt --- yathā dravye aṇuḥ śabdo 'lpo manda ity etasya grahaṇaṃ mahan śabdaḥ paṭus tīvra ity etasya grahaṇam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1526: iyattānavadhāraṇāt/ na hy ayaṃ mahān śabda iti vyavasyann iyān ayam ity avadhārayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1529: saṃyukte ime iti ca dvitvasamānāśrayaprāptigrahaṇam --- dvau samudāyāv āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti cet ko 'yaṃ samudāyaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1530: prāptir anekasyānekā vā prāptir ekasya samudāya iti cet prāpter agrahaṇaṃ prāptyāśritāyāḥ/ saṃyukte ime vastunī iti nātra dve prāptī saṃyukte gṛhyete/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1532_0: na dvitvena samānādhikaraṇasya grahaṇāt / dvāv imau saṃyuktāv arthāv iti grahaṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:1532_1: sati nānekasamūhāśrayaḥ saṃyogo gṛhyate / na ca dvayor aṇvor grahaṇam asti / tasmān
GSP29nysvbh1u:1532_2: mahatī dvitvāśrayabhūte dravye saṃyogasya sthānam iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1534: pratyāsattiḥ pratīghātāvasānā saṃyogo nārthāntaram iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1535: nārthāntarahetutvāt saṃyogasya/ śabdarūpādispandānāṃ hetuḥ saṃyogaḥ/ na ca dravyayor guṇāntaropajananam antareṇa śabde rūpādiṣu spande ca kāraṇatvaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1536: tasmād guṇāntaram/ pratyayaviṣayaś cārthāntaraṃ tatpratiṣedho vā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1537: kuṇḍalī gurur akuṇḍalaś chātra iti/ saṃyogabuddheś ca yady arthāntaraṃ na viṣayaḥ arthāntarapratiṣedhas tarhi viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1538: tatra pratiṣidhyamānavacanam --- saṃyukte dravye iti yad arthāntaram anyatra dṛṣṭam iha pratiṣidhyate tadvaktavyam iti/ dvayor mahator āśritasya grahaṇān nāṇvāśraya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1541_1: aṇusamavasthānaṃ viṣaya iti cet prāptāprāptasāmarthyavacanam --- kim aprāpte aṇusamavasthāne
GSP29nysvbh1u:1541_2: tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyate atha prāpte iti / aprāpte grahaṇam iti cet vyavahitasyāṇusamavasthānasyāpy upalabdhiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1542: vyavahite 'ṇsamavasthāne tadāśrayo jātiviśeṣo gṛhyeta/ prāpte grahaṇam iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1544: madhyaparabhāgayor aprāptāv anabhivyaktiḥ/ yāvat prāptaṃ bhavati tāvaty abhivyaktir iti cet,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1545_0: tāvato 'dhikaraṇatvam aṇusamavasthānasya / yāvati prāpte jātiviśeṣe gṛhyate tāvad
GSP29nysvbh1u:1545_1: asyādhikaraṇam iti prāptaṃ bhavati / tatraikasamudāye pratīyamāne 'rthabhedaḥ / evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1545_2: ca sati yo 'yam aṇusamudāyo vṛkṣa iti pratīyate tatra vṛkṣabahutvaṃ pratīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1546: yatra yatra hy aṇusamudāyasya bhāge vṛkṣatvaṃ gṛhyate sa sa vṛkṣa iti/ tasmāt samuditāṇusamavasthānasyārthāntarasya jātiviśeṣābhivyaktiviṣayatvād avayavyarthāntarabhūta iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1552: apramāṇam iti ekadāpy arthasya na pratipādakam iti/ rodhād api nadī pūrṇā gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1553: tadā copariṣṭād vṛṣṭo deva iti mithyānumānam/ nīḍopaghātād api pipīlikāṇḍasañcāro bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1554: tadā ca bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭir iti mithyānumānam iti/ puruṣo 'pi mayūravāśitam anukaroti tadā 'pi śabdasādṛśyān mithyānumānaṃ bhavati//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1559: nāyam anumānavyabhicāraḥ, ananumāne tu khalv ayam anumānābhimānaḥ/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560_0: nāviśiṣṭo liṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati / pūrvodakaviśiṣṭaṃ khalu varṣodakaṃ śīgrataratvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560_1: srātaso bahutaraphenaphalaparṇakāṣṭhādivahanaṃ copalabhamānaḥ pūrṇatvena nadyā upari
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560_2: vṛṣṭo deva ity anuminoti nodakavṛddhimātreṇa / pipīlikāprāyasyāṇḍasañcāre bhaviṣyati
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560_3: vṛṣṭir ity anumīyate na kāsāñcid iti / nedaṃ mayūravāśitaṃ tatsadṛśo 'yaṃ śabda iti
GSP29nysvbh1u:1560_4: viśeṣāparijñānān mithyānumānam iti / yas tu sadṛśād viśiṣṭāc chabdād viśisṭamayūravāśitaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1561: yathā sarpādīnām iti/ so 'yam anumātur aparādho nānumānasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1566: trikālaviṣayam anumānaṃ traikālyagrahaṇād ity uktam/ ata ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1568: vṛntāt pracyutasya phalasya bhūmau pratyāsīdato yadūrdhvaṃ sa patito 'dhvā tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitakālaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1570: tatsaṃyuktaḥ kālaḥ patitavyakālaḥ/ nedānīṃ tṛtīyo 'dhvā vidyate yatra patatīti vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyeta/ tasmād vartamānaḥ kālo na vidyata iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1574: NyS_2,1.40: tayor apy abhāvo vartamānābhāve tadapekṣatvāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1576: kriyāvyaṅgyaḥ patatīti/ yadā patanakriyā vyuparatā bhavati sa kālaḥ patitakālaḥ/ yadotpatsyate sa patitavyakālaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1578: yadā dravye vartamānā kriyā gṛhyate sa vartamānaḥ kālaḥ/ yadi cāyaṃ dravye vartamānaṃ patanaṃ na gṛhṇāti kasyoparamam utpatsyamānatāṃ vā pratipadyate/ patitaḥ kāla iti bhūtā kriyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1581: adhaḥ patatīti kriyāsambaddham/ so 'yaṃ kriyādravyayoḥ sambandhaṃ gṛhṇātīti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1582: tadāśrayau cetarau kālau tadahāve na syātām iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1588: yady atītānāgatāv itaretarāpekṣau sidhyetāṃ pratipadyemahi vartamānavilopam/ nātītāpekṣānāgatasiddhiḥ nāpy anāgatāpekṣātītasiddhiḥ/ kayā yuktyā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1590_0: kena ca kalpenānāgata iti naitac chakyaṃ nirvaktum avyākaraṇīyam etad vartamānalopa
GSP29nysvbh1u:1590_1: iti / yac ca manyeta hrasvadīrghayoḥ sthalanimnayoś chāyātapayoś ca yathetaretarāpekṣayā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1591: tan nopapadyate viśeṣahetvabhāvāt/ dṛṣṭāntavat pratidṛṣṭānto 'pi prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1592: yathā rūpasparśau gandharasau netaretarāpekṣau siddhyataḥ evam atītānāgatāv iti netaretarāpekṣā kasyacit siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1594: yasmād ekābhāve ṇyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāvaḥ --- yady ekasyānyatarāpekṣā siddhir anyatarasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1595: yady anyatarasyaikāpekṣā siddhir ekasyedānīṃ kim apekṣā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1596: evam ekasyābhāve anyataran na sidhyatīty ubhayābhāvaḥ prasajyate//41//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1600: vidyate dravyaṃ vidyate guṇaḥ vidyate karmeti/ yasya cāyaṃ nāsti, tasya ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1603: na cāvidyamānam asad indriyeṇa sannikṛṣyate/ nacāyaṃ vidyamānaṃ sat kiñcid anujānāti/ pratyakṣanimittaṃ pratyakṣaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣajñānaṃ sarvaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1604: pratyakṣānupapattau tatpūrvakatvād anumānāgamayor anupapattiḥ/ sarvapramāṇavilope sarvagrahaṇaṃ na bhavatīti//42//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1608_0: ubhayathā ca vartamānaḥ kālo gṛhyate kvacid arthasadbhāvavyaṅgyaḥ yathāsti dravyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1608_1: iti / kvacit kriyāsantānavyaṅgyaḥ yathā pacati chinattīti / nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1608_2: kriyāsantānaḥ kriyābhyāsaś ca / nānāvidhā caikārthā kriyā pacatīti sthālyadhiśrayaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1608_3: udakāsecanaṃ taṇḍulāvapanam edho'pasarpaṇam agnyabhijvālanaṃ darvīghaṭṭanaṃ maṇḍasrāvaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1609: chinattīti kriyābhyāsa udyamyodyamya paraśuṃ dāruṇi nipātayan chinattīty ucyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1611: yac cedaṃ pacyamānaṃ chidyamānaṃ ca tat kriyamāṇam, tasmin kriyamāṇe ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:1613: kriyāsantāno ṇārabdhaś cikīrṣito .āgataḥ kālaḥ pakṣyatīti/ prayojanāvasānaḥ kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṣīd iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1614: % kriyāsantānoparamaḥ atītaḥ kālaḥ apākṛīd iti/] p.526
GSP29nysvbh1u:1615_0: ārabdhakriyāsantāno vartamānaḥ kālaḥ pacatīti / tatra yā uparatā sā kṛtatā / yā cikīrṣitā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1615_1: sā kartavyatā / yā vidyamānā sā kriyamāṇatā / tad evaṃ kriyāsantānasthas traikālyasamāhāraḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616_0: kriyāsantānasya hy atrāvicchedo 'bhidhīyate nārambho noparama iti / so 'yam ubhayathā
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616_1: vartamāno gṛhyate apavṛkto vyapavṛktaś cātītānāgatābhyām / sthitivyaṅgyaḥ --- vidyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616_2: dravyam iti / kriyāsantānāvicchedābhidhāyī ca traikālyānvitaḥ --- pacati chinattīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616_3: anyaś ca pratyāsattiprabhṛter arthasya vivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyī bahuprakāro lokeṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:1616_4: utprekṣitavyaḥ / tasmād asti vartamānaḥ kāla iti //43 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:1621: atyantasādharmyād upamānaṃ na sidhyati/ na caivaṃ bhavati yathā gaur evaṃ gaur iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:1624: na hi bhavati yathānaḍvān evaṃ mahiṣa iti/ ekadeśasādharmyād upamānaṃ na sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1625: na hi sarveṇa sarvam upamīyata iti//44//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1629: na sādharmyasya kṛtsnaprāyālpabhāvam āśrityopamānaṃ pravartate/ kiṃ tarhi?
GSP29nysvbh1u:1631: prasiddhasādharmyāt sādhyasādhanabhāvam āśritya pravartate/ yatra caitad asti na tatropamānaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ śakyam/ tasmād yathoktadoṣo nopapadyata iti//45//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1636: yathā dhūmena pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya vahner grahaṇam anumānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:1637: evaṃ gavā pratyakṣeṇāpratyakṣasya gavayasya grahaṇam iti nedam anumānād viśiṣyate//46//
GSP29nysvbh1u:1642: NyS_2,1.47: nāpratyakṣe gavaye pramāṇārtham upamānasya paśyāmaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:1643_0: yadā hy ayam upayuktopamāno godarśī gavayasamānam arthaṃ paśyati tadāyaṃ gavaya ity
GSP29nysvbh1u:1643_1: asya saṃjñāśabdasya vyavasthāṃ pratipadyate na caivam anumānam iti / parārthaṃ copamānam
GSP29nysvbh1u:1643_2: --- yasya hy upamānam aprasiddhaṃ tadarthaṃ prasiddhobhayena kriyata iti parārtham

GSP29nysvbh1u:2652_5: ajñātvādhyavasyaty ajñāsiṣam iti / evaṃ smṛtim api trikālaviśiṣṭāṃ suṣmūrṣāviśiṣṭāṃ

GSP29nysvbh1u:2665_0: evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ vidyate yenāyaṃ

GSP29nysvbh1u:2676_0: rūpādibhyaś ca viṣayāntaraṃ sukhādayas tadupalabdhau karaṇāntarasadbhāvaḥ / yathā

GSP29nysvbh1u:2678_0: tac ca jñānāyaugapadyaliṅgam / yac ca sukhādyupalabdhau karaṇaṃ tac ca jñānāyaugaoadyaliṅgaṃ

GSP29nysvbh1u:2733: na cāsati nimitte kasyacid utpattiḥ/ na ca dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭam abhilāṣahetuṃ bādhate/ tasmād ayaso 'yaskāntābhigamanam adṛṣṭānta iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:2734: ayasaḥ khalv api nānyatra pravṛttir bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2738_0: sa ca kriyāniyamaliṅgaḥ / evaṃ bālasyāpi niyataviṣayo 'bhilāṣaḥ kāraṇaniyamād bhavitum
GSP29nysvbh1u:2738_1: arhati / tac ca kāraṇam abhyastasmaraṇam anyad veti dṛṣṭena viśiṣyate / dṛṣṭo hi

GSP29nysvbh1u:2759: na khalu saguṇadravyotpattivad utpattir ātmano rāgasya ca/ kasmāt?

GSP29nysvbh1u:2761_1: rāga iti / ātmotpādādhikaraṇāt tu rāgotpattir bhavantī saṅkalpād anyasmin rāgakāraṇe
GSP29nysvbh1u:2761_2: sati vācyā kāryadravyaguṇavat / na cātmotpādaḥ siddho nāpi saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam asti /

GSP29nysvbh1u:2763: tasmād ayuktaṃ saguṇadravyotpattivat tayor utpattir iti/

GSP29nysvbh1u:2766_0: tanmayatvād rāga iti / viṣayābhyāsaḥ khalv ayaṃ bhāvanāhetuḥ tanmayatvam ucyate iti /

GSP29nysvbh1u:2766_2: tācchabdyaṃ vijñāyate / tasmād anupapannaṃ saṅkalpād anyad rāgakāraṇam iti //26 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:2771: svakṛtakarmanimittaṃ cāsya śarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhādhiṣṭhānam/ tat parīkṣyate --- kiṃ ghrāṇādivad ekaprakṛtikam uta nānāprakṛtīti/ kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?

GSP29nysvbh1u:2776_0: guṇāntaropalabdheḥ / gandhavatī pṛthivī gandhavac ca śarīram / abādīnām agandhatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:2776_1: tatprakṛtyagandhaṃ syāt / na tv idam abādibhir asampṛktayā pṛthivyārabdhaṃ ceṣṭendriyārthāśrayabhāvena
GSP29nysvbh1u:2776_2: kalpate ity ataḥ pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyoge sati śarīraṃ bhavati / bhūtasaṃyogo hi

GSP29nysvbh1u:2794_1: śrūyate / seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛtir abhidhīyata iti / sthālyādiṣu ca tulyajātīyānām
GSP29nysvbh1u:2797: athedānīm indriyāṇi prameyakrameṇa vicāryante --- kim āvyaktikāny āhosvid bhautikānīti/

GSP29nysvbh1u:2810_0: mahad iti mahattaraṃ mahattamaṃ copalabhyate yathā nyagrodhaparvatādi / aṇv iti aṇutaram

GSP29nysvbh1u:2825: mahattvād anekadravyavattvād rūpavattvāc copalabdhir iti pradīpavat pratyakṣata upalabhyeta cākṣuṣo raśmir yadi syād iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2829: sannikarṣapratiṣedhārthenāvaraṇena liṅgenānumīyamānasya raśmer yā pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhir nāsāv abhāvaṃ pratipādayati yathā candramasaḥ parabhāgasya prthivyāś cādhobhāgasya//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:2834: bhinnaḥ khalv ayaṃ dravyadharmo guṇadharmaś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835_0: mahadanekadravyavac ca viṣaktāvayavam āpyaṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣato nopalabhyate sparśas
GSP29nysvbh1u:2835_1: tu śīto gṛhyate / tasya dravyasyānubandhād hemantaśiśirau kalpyete tathāvidham eva
