GSP29nysvbh1u:3102_3: ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ bruvataḥ pratyakṣo vāyuḥ prasajyate niyame vā kāraṇam ucyatām iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3104: rasayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt --- pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3106: na caitat saṃsargād bhavtitum arhati/ rūpayor vā pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt taijasarūpānugṛhītayoḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3107: saṃsarge hi vyañjakam eva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyam astīti/ ekānekavidhatve ca pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād rūpayoḥ/ pārthivaṃ haritalohitapītādyanekavidhaṃ rūpam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3109: na caitad ekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge saty upapadyata iti/ udāharaṇamātraṃ caitat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3111: sparśayor vā pārthivataijasayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/ pārthivo 'nuṣnāśītaḥ sparśaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3113: na caitad ekaguṇānām anuṣṇāśītasparśena vāyunā saṃsargeṇopapadyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3114: atha vā pārthivāpyayor dravyayor vyvasthitaguṇayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/ caturguṇaṃ pārthivaṃ dravyaṃ triguṇam āpyaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3115_0: tena tatkāraṇam anumīyate tathābhūtam iti / tasya kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ kāraṇabhāvād dhi
GSP29nysvbh1u:3115_1: kāryabhāva iti / evaṃ taijasavāyavyayor dravyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād guṇavyavasthāyāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3116: dṛṣṭaś ca vivekaḥ pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt/ pārthivaṃ dravyam abādibhir viyuktaṃ pratyakṣato gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3120: na caikaikaguṇaṃ gṛhyata iti/ niranumānaṃ tu ``viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇa'' ity etad iti/ nātra liṅgam anumāpakaṃ gṛhyata iti yenaitad evaṃ pratipadyemahi/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3121: yac coktaṃ viṣṭaṃ hy aparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāmpratam iti niyamakāraṇābhāvād ayuktam/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmpratam aparaṃ pareṇa viṣṭam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3122: vāyunā ca viṣṭaṃ teja iti/ viṣṭatvaṃ saṃyogaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3124: vāyunā ca viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejo na tu tejasā viṣṭatvād rūpavān vāyur iti niyamakāraṇaṃ nāstīti/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca taijasena sparśena vāyavyasya sparśasyābhibhavād agrahaṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3128: tad evaṃ nyāyaviruddhaṃ pravādaṃ pratiṣidhya ``na sarvaguṇānupalabdher'' iti coditaṃ samādhīyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3131: ghrāṇādīnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ gandhāder guṇasyotkarṣāt tat tat pradhānam/ kā pradhānatā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3133_0: abhivyaktau samarthatvam / yathā bāhyānāṃ pārthivāpyataijasānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3133_1: na sarvaguṇavyañjakatvaṃ gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpavyañjakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3135: evaṃ ghrāṇa rasanacakṣuṣā.ṃ caturguṇatriguṇadviguṇānāṃ na sarvaguṇagrāhakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3136: gandharasarūpotkarṣāt tu yathākramaṃ gandharasarūpagrāhakatvam/ tasmād ghrāṇādibhir na sarveṣāṃ guṇānām upalabdhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3137: yas tu pratijānīte gandhaguṇatvād ghrāṇaṃ gandhasya grāhakam evaṃ rasanādiṣv apīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3138: tasya yathāguṇayogaṃ ghrāṇādibhir guṇagrahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//68//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3142: kiṃkṛtaṃ punar vyavasthānam --- kiñcit pārthivam indriyaṃ na sarvāṇi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3145: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam/ dṛṣṭo hi prakarṣe bhūyastvaśabdaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3146: yathā prakṛṣṭo viṣayo bhūyān ity ucyate/ yathā pṛthagarthakriyāsamarthāni puruṣasaṃskāravaśād viṣauṣadhimaṇiprabhṛtīni dravyāṇi nirvartyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3148: evaṃ pṛthagviṣayagrahaṇasamarthāni ghrāṇādīni nirvartyante na sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānīti//69//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3152: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇi/ kasmād iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3154: svān gandhādīn nopalabhante ghrāṇādīni/ kena kāraṇeneti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3155: svaguṇaiḥ saha ghrāṇādīnām indriyabhāvāt/ ghrāṇaṃ svena gandhena samānārthakāriṇā saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ sahakārivaikalyān na bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3159: yadi punar gandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya grāhyaś cety ata āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3162: na guṇopalabdhir indriyāṇām/ yo brūte --- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣā (corr.; cakṣaṣā, ed.)
GSP29nysvbh1u:3163: gṛhyate tathā tenaiva cakṣuṣā tad eva cakṣur gṛhyatām iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3164: tādṛṅ idam; tulyo hy ubhayatra pratipattihetvabhāva iti//71//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3168: svaguṇān nopalabhanta indriyāṇīti etan na bhavati/ upalabhyate hi svaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ śrotreṇeti//72//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3173: na śabdena guṇena saguṇam ākāśam indriyaṃ bhavati/ na śabdaḥ śabdasya vyañjakaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3175: nāpy anumīyate/ anumīyate tu śrotreṇākāśena śabdasya grahaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3176: śabdaguṇatvaṃ ca ākāśasyeti/ pariśeṣaś cānumānaṃ veditavyam/ ātmā tāvat śrotā na karaṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3181: asti cedaṃ śrotram ākāśaṃ ca śiṣyate, pariśeṣād ākāśaṃ śrotram iti//73//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3189: sā kim anityā nityā veti/ kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3191: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3193: viparyayaś ca yathāsvam anityanityayos tasyāṃ buddau nopalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3197: anupapannarūpaḥ khalv ayaṃ saṃśayaḥ/ sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyā anityā buddhiḥ sukhādivat/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3199: bhavati ca saṃvittiḥ --- jñāsyāmi jānāmi ajñāsiṣam iti/ na copajanāpāyāv antareṇa traikālyavyāktiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3200: tataś ca traikālyavyakter anityā buddhir ity etat śiddham/ pramāṇasiddhaṃ cedaṃ śāstare 'py uktam --- `indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam',
GSP29nysvbh1u:3201: `yugapaj jñānānutpattir manaso liṅgam ityevamādi/ tasmāt saṃśayaprakriyānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3202: dṛṣṭipravādopālambhārthan tu prakaraṇam/ evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti sāṅkhyāḥ --- puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇabhūtā nityā buddhir iti/ sādhanaṃ ca pracakṣate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3206: yaṃ pūrvam ajñāsiṣam arthaṃ tam imaṃ jānāmīti jñānyoḥ samāne 'rthe pratisandhijñānaṃ pratyabhijñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3207: etac cāvasthitāyā buddher upapannam/ nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu pratyabhijñānānupapattiḥ nānyajñātam anyaḥ pratyabhijānātīti//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3211: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānam apīti/ kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3212: cetanadharmasya karaṇe 'nupapattiḥ/ puruṣadharmaḥ khalv ayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanam upalabdhir bodhaḥ pratyayaḥ adhyavasāya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3215_0: tasyaitasmād dhetor nityatvaṃ yuktam iti / karaṇacaitanyābhyupagame tu cetanasvarūpaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3215_1: vacanīyaṃ nānirdiṣṭasvarūpam ātmāntaraṃ śakyam astīti pratipattum / jñānaṃ ced buddher
GSP29nysvbh1u:3215_2: antaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3216: jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ karotīti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3218: jñānād arthāntaravacanam --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānātīti nedaṃ jñānād arthāntaram ucyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3219_0: cetayate jānīte buddhyate paśyati upalabhate ity eko 'yam artha iti / buddhir jñpayatīti
GSP29nysvbh1u:3219_1: cet addhā --- jānīte puruṣo buddhir jñāpayatīti satyam etat / evaṃ cābhyupagame jñānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3219_2: puruṣasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddher antaḥkaraṇasyeti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3221: pratipuruṣaṃ ca śabdāntaravyavasthāpratijñāne pratiṣedhahetuvacanam/ yaś ca pratijānīte --- kaścit puruṣaś cetayate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3225: puruṣāntarāṇi khalv imāni cetano boddhopalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyaite dharmā iti atra kaḥ pratiṣedhahetur iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3226: arthasyābheda iti cet samānam/ abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattir ity evaṃ cen manyase,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3227_0: samānaṃ bhavati --- puruṣaś cetayate buddhir jānīte ity atrāpy artho na bhidyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3227_1: tatrobhayoś cetanatvād anyataralopa iti / yadi punar budhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3230: na tu manaso viṣayapratyabhijñānān nityatvam/ dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñātur ekatvāt pratyabhijñānaṃ `savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānād' iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3233: pradīpāntaradṛṣṭasya pradīpāntareṇa pratyabhijñānam iti/ tasmāj jñātur ayaṃ nityatve hetur iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3236: yac ca manyate buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayo jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiś ca vṛttimato nānyeti, tac ca ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3238: vṛttivṛttimator ananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnām avasthānam iti yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tāny avatiṣṭanta iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3243: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimān apy atīta ity antaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3247: avibhu caikaṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyata iti ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3254: apratyabhijñānam anupalabdhiḥ/ anupalabdhiś ca kasyācid arthasya viṣayāntaravyāsakte manasy upapadyate vṛttivṛttimator nānātvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3260: prāptānīndriyāṇy antaḥkaraṇeneti prāptyarthasya gamanasyābhāvaḥ/ tatra kramavṛttitvābhāvād ayugapad grahaṇānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3262_0: gatyabhāvāc ca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:3262_1: iti / yathā cakṣuṣo gatiḥ pratiṣiddhā sannikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭayos tulyakālagrahaṇāt pāṇicandramasor
GSP29nysvbh1u:3262_2: vyavadhānena pratīghāte so'numīyata iti so 'yaṃ nāntaḥ karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve /
GSP29nysvbh1u:3263: % karaṇe vivādo na tasya nityatve] p.819
GSP29nysvbh1u:3264: siddhaṃ hi mano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ nityaṃ ceti/ kva tarhi vivādaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3266: tac ca pramāṇato 'nupalabdheḥ pratiṣiddham iti/ ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmakā vṛttayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3267_0: cakṣurvijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ rūpavijñānaṃ gandhavijñānam / etac ca vṛttivṛttimator
GSP29nysvbh1u:3267_1: ekatve 'nupapannam iti / puruṣo jānīte nāntaḥkaraṇam iti / etena viṣayāntaravyāsaṅgaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3268: kenacid indriyeṇa sannidhiḥ kenacid asannidhir ity ayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3272: ekam antaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā vṛttaya iti/ saty abhede vṛtter idam ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3275: yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike anyatvābhimāno nīlo lohita iti; evaṃ viṣayāntaropadhānād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3277_0: na hetvabhāvāt / sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇo na punar
GSP29nysvbh1u:3277_1: gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad iti hetur nāsti hetvabhāvād anupapanna iti / samāno hetvabhāva
GSP29nysvbh1u:3277_2: iti cet na jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanāt --- krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu jñānāny
GSP29nysvbh1u:3279: tasmād gandhādyanyatvābhimānavad ayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāna iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3283: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavad ity etad amṛṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇikavādy āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3284: NyS_3,2.10: sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām ahetuḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3286: sphaṭikasyābhedenāvasthitasyopadhānabhedān nānātvābhimāna ity ayam avidyamānahetukaḥ pakṣaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3287: sphaṭike 'py aparāparotpatteḥ/ sphaṭike 'pi anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyanta iti/ katham?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3288: kṣaṇikatvād vyaktīnām/ kṣaṇaś cālpīyān kālaḥ kṣaṇasthitikāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ/ kathaṃ punar gamyate kṣaṇikā vyaktaya iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3289: upacayāpacayaprabandhadarśanāc charīrādiṣu/ paktinirvṛttasyāhārarasasya śarīre rudhirādibhāvenopacayo 'pacayaś ca prabandhena pravarttate/ upacayād vyaktīnām utpādaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3290: apacayād vyaktinirodhaḥ/ evaṃ ca saty avayavapariṇāmabhedena vṛddhiḥ śarīrasya kālāntare gṛhyate iti so 'yaṃ vyaktiviśeṣadharmo vyaktimātre veditavya iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3295: sarvāsu vyaktiṣu upacayāpacayaprabandhaḥ śarīravad iti nāyaṃ niyamaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3296: hetvabhāvāt/ nātra pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vā pratipādakam astīti/ tasmād yathādarśanam abhyanujñā/ yatra yatropacayāpacayaprabandho dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3299: yathā śarīrādiṣu/ yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra tatra pratyākhyāyate yathā grāvaprabhṛtiṣu/ sphaṭike 'py upacayāpacayaprabandho na dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3300: tasmād ayuktaṃ sphaṭike 'py aparāprotpattir iti/ yathā cārkasya kaṭukimnā sarvadravyāṇāṃ kaṭukimānām āpādayet tādṛg etad iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3303: yaś cāśeṣanirodhenāpūrvotpādaṃ niranvayaṃ dravyasantāne kṣaṇikatāṃ manyate tasyaitat ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3308: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe niranvaye vāpūrvotpāde na kāraṇam ubhayatrāpy upalabhyate iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3312: NyS_3,2.13: kṣīravināśe kāraṇānupalabdhivad dadhyutpattivac ca tadupapattiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:3313: yathānupalabhyamānaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñāyate tathā sphaṭike parāparāsu vyaktiṣu vināśakāraṇam utpādakāraṇaṃ cābhyanujñeyam iti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3318: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutpattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate 'to nānupalabdhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3319: viparyayas tu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattau vyaktīnāṃ na liṅgam astīty anutpattir eveti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3325: payasaḥ pariṇāmo na vināśa ity eka āha/ pariṇāmaś cāvasthitasya dravyasya pūrvadharmanivṛttau dharmāntarotpattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3326: guṇāntaraprādurbhāva ity apara āha/ satā dravyasya pūrvaguṇanivṛttau guṇāntaram utpadyata iti/ sa khalv ekapakṣībhāva iva//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3332: saṃmūrchanalakṣaṇād avayavavyūhād dravyāntare dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo nivṛttam ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3333_0: yathā mṛdavayavānāṃ vyūhāntarād dravyāntare sthālyām utpannāyāṃ pūrvaṃ mṛtpiṇḍadravyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3333_1: mṛdavayavavibhāgebhyo nivarttate iti / mṛdvac cāvayavānvayaḥ payodadhnor nāśeṣanirodhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:3337: abhyanujñāya ca niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha ucyate ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:3338: NyS_3,2.17: kvacid vināśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ kvacic copalabdher anekāntaḥ ||

GSP29nysvbh1u:3961_0: vyaktād bhūtasamākhyātāt pṛthivyāditaḥ paramasūkṣmān nityād vyaktaṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayopakaraṇādhāraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3961_1: prajñātaṃ dravyam utpadyate / vyaktaṃ ca khalv indriyagrāhyaṃ tatsāmānyāt kāraṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:3962: rūpādiguṇayogaḥ rūpādiguṇayuktebhyaḥ pṛthivyādibhyo nityebhyo rūpādiguṇayuktaṃ śarīrādy utpadyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:3964: pratyakṣaprāmāṇyāt --- dṛṣṭo hi rūpādiguṇayuktebhyo mṛtprabhṛtibhyas tathābhūtasya dravyasyotpādaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3965: tena cādṛṣṭasyānumānam iti/ rūpādīnām anvayadarśanāt prakṛtivikārayoḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3970: idam api pratyakṣam --- na khalu vyaktād ghaṭād vyakto ghaṭa utpadyamāno dṛśyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3971: vyaktād vyaktasyānutpattidarśanān na vyaktaṃ kāraṇam iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3976: na brūmaḥ sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3977_0: kin tu yad utpadyate vyaktaṃ dravyaṃ tat tathābhūtād evotpadyate iti / vyaktaṃ ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:3977_1: tanmṛddravyaṃ kapālasaṃjñakaṃ yato ghaṭa utpadyate / na caitannihnuvānaḥ kvacid abhyanujñāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:3983: asataḥ sad utpadyate ity ayaṃ pakṣaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:3984: upamṛdya prādurbhāvāt/ upamṛdya bījam aṅkura utpadyate nānupamṛdya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:3985: na ced vījopamardo 'ṅkurakāraṇam anupamarde 'pi bījasyāṅkurotpattiḥ syād iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:3990_0: upamṛdya prādurbhāvād ity ayuktaḥ prayogo vyāghātāt / yad upamṛdnāti na tad upamṛdya
GSP29nysvbh1u:3990_1: prādurbhavitum arhati vidyamānatvāt / yac ca prādurbhavati na tenāprādurbhūtenāvidyamānenopamarda iti //15 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:3995: atīte cānāgate cāvidyamāne kārakaśabdāḥ prayujyante/ putro janiṣyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4001: ajātāḥ putrāḥ pitaraṃ tāpayantīti bahulaṃ bhāktāḥ prayogā dṛśyante/ kā punar iyaṃ bhaktiḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4004: prādurbhaviṣyann aṅkura upamṛdnātīti bhāktaṃ kartṛtvam iti//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4009: na vinaṣṭād bījād aṅkura utpadyate iti tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4015: sa khalv abhāvād bhāvotpatter hetur nirdiśyate;
GSP29nysvbh1u:4016_0: sa ca na pratiṣidhyate iti / vyāhatavyūhānām avayavānāṃ pūrvavyūhanivṛttau vyūhāntarād
GSP29nysvbh1u:4016_1: dravyaniṣpattir nābhāvāt / bījāvayavāḥ kutaścin nimittāt prādurbhūtakriyāḥ pūrvavyūhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4016_2: jahati vyūhāntaraṃ cāpadyante vyūhāntarād aṅkura utpadyate / dṛśyante khalu avayavās
GSP29nysvbh1u:4016_3: tatsaṃyogāś cāṅkurotpattihetavaḥ / na cānivṛtte pūrvavyūhe bījāvayavānāṃ śakyaṃ vyūhāntareṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:4018: tasmān nābhāvād bhāvotpattir iti/ na cānyad bījāvayavebhyo 'ṅkurotpattikāraṇam ity upapadyte bījopādānaniyama iti//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4023: puruṣo 'yaṃ samīhamāno nāvaśyaṃ samīhāphalaṃ prāpnoti tenānumīyate parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya karmaphalārādhanam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4024: yadadhīnaṃ sa īśvaraḥ/ tasmād īśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4029: īśvarādhīnā cet phalaniṣpattiḥ syād api tarhi puruṣasya samīhām antareṇa phalaṃ niṣpadyeteti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4035: phalāya puruṣasya yatamānasyeśvaraḥ phalaṃ sampādayatīti/ yadā na sampādayati tadā puruṣakarmāphalaṃ bhavatīti/ tasmād īśvarakāritatvāt ahetuḥ puruṣakarmābhāve phalāniṣpatter iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4036: guṇaviśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ/ tasya ātmakalpāt kalpāntarānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4037: adharmamithyājñānapramādahānyā dharmajñānasamādhisampadā ca viśiṣṭam ātmāntaram īśvaraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_0: tasya ca dharmasamādhiphalam aṇimādyaṣṭavidham aiśvaryam / saṅkalpānuvidhāyī cāsya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_1: dharmaḥ pratyātmavṛttīn dharmādharmasañcayān pṛthivyādīni ca bhūtāni pravartayati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_2: evaṃ ca svakṛtābhyāgamasyālopena nirmāṇaprākāmyam īśvarasya svakṛtakarmaphalaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_3: āptakalpaś cāyam --- yathā pitāpatyānāṃ tathā pitṛbhūta īśvaro bhūtānām / na cātmakalpād
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_4: anyaḥ kalpaḥ sambhavati / na tāvad asya buddhiṃ vinā kaścid dharmo liṅgabhūtaḥ śakya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_5: upapādayitum / āgamāc ca draṣṭā boddhā sarvajñātā īśvara iti / buddhyādibhiś cātmaliṅgair
GSP29nysvbh1u:4039_6: nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4040: % liṅgair nirupākhyam īśvaraṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamaviṣayātītaṃ kaḥ śakta upapādayitum/] p.945
GSP29nysvbh1u:4041: svakṛtābhyāgamalopena ca pravartamānasyāsya yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhajātam akarmanimitte śarīrasarge tat sarvaṃ prasajyate iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4052: nirnimittaṃ ca upādānavac ca dṛṣṭaṃ tathā śarīrādisargo .pīti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4056: animittato bhāvotpattir ity ucyate yataś cotpadyate tannimittam/ animittasya nimittatvān nānimittā bhāvotpattir iti//23//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4061: anyad dhi nimittam anyac ca nimittapratyākhyānam, na ca pratyākhyānam eva pratyākhyeyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4063: yathānudakaḥ kamaṇḍalur iti nodakapratiṣedha udakaṃ bhavatīti/ sa khalv ayaṃ vādo 'karmanimittaḥ śarīrādisarga ity etasmān na bhidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4071: yasya kadācid bhāvas tad anityam/ utpattidharmakam anutpannaṃ nāsti vināśadharmakaṃ ca vinaṣṭaṃ nāsti/ kiṃ punaḥ sarvam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4081: tannityatvān na sarvam anityam/ athānityā tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ sarvaṃ nityam iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4087: yathā agnir dāhyaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyati evaṃ sarvasyānityatā sarvaṃ vināśyānuvinaśyatīti//27//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4091: ayaṃ khalu vādo nityaṃ pratyācaṣṭe, nityasya ca pratyākhyānam anupapannam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4092: yathopalabdhi vyavasthānāt/ yasyotpattivināśadharmakatvam upalabhyate pramāṇatas tad anityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4094_0: yasya nopalabhyate tadviparītam / na ca paramasūkṣmāṇāṃ bhūtānām ākāśakāladigātmamanasāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4094_1: tadguṇānāṃ ca keṣāñcit sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ cotpattivināśadharmakatvaṃ pramāṇata upalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4101: bhūtamātram idaṃ sarvaṃ tāni ca nityāni bhūtocchedānupapatter iti//29//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4105: utpattikāraṇaṃ copalabhyate vināśakāraṇaṃ ca, tat sarvanityatve vyāhanyate iti//30//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4112: bhūtalakṣaṇāvarodhād bhūtamātram idam ity ukto 'yaṃ pratiṣedha iti//31//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4117: kāraṇasamānaguṇasyotpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ copalabhyate/ na caitad ubhayaṃ nityaviṣayam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4119: na cāviṣayā kācid upalabdhiḥ/ upalabdhisāmarthyāt kāraṇena samānaguṇaṃ kāryam utpadyate ity anumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4120: sa khalūpalabdher viṣaya iti/ evaṃ ca tallakṣaṇāvarodhopapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4121: utpattivināśakāraṇaprayuktasya jñātuḥ prayatno dṛṣṭa iti/ prasiddhaś cāvayavī taddharmā/ utpattivināśadharmā cāvayavī siddha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4123: śabdakarmabuddhyādīnāṃ cāvyāptiḥ/ pañcabhūtanityatvāt tallakṣaṇāvarodhāc cety anena śabdakarmabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca na vyāptāḥ tasmād anekāntaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4124_0: svapnaviṣayābhimānavan mithyopalabdhir iti cet bhūtopalabdhau tulyam / yathā svapne
GSP29nysvbh1u:4124_1: viṣayābhimāna evam utpattikāraṇābhimāna iti / evaṃ caitad bhūtopalabdhau tulyaṃ pṛthivyādyupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:4126: pṛthivyādyabhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti cet tad itaratra samānam --- utpattivināśakāraṇopalabdhiviṣayasyāpy abhāve sarvavyavahāravilopa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4127: so 'yaṃ nityānām atīndriyatvād aviṣayatvāc cotpattivināśayoḥ svapnaviṣayābhimānavad ity ahetur iti//32//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4130: avasthitasyopādānasya dharmamātraṃ nivartate dharmamātram upajāyate sa khalūtpattivināśayor viṣayaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4132: yac copajāyate tat prāg apy upajananād asti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4133: yac ca nivartate tan nivṛttam apy astīti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4136: ayam upajanaḥ iyaṃ nivṛttir iti vyavasthā nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4137: upajātanivṛttayor vidyamānatvāt/ ayaṃ dharma upajāto 'yaṃ nivṛtta iti sadbhāvāviśeṣād avyavasthā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4138: idānīm upajananivṛttī nedānīm iti kālavyavasthā nopapadyate sarvadā vidyamānatvāt asya dharmasyopajananivṛttī nāsyeti vyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4140: ubhyor aviśeṣāt/ anāgato 'tīta iti ca kālavyavasthānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4141_1: nivṛttir ity etasmin sati naite doṣāḥ / tasmād yad uktaṃ prāg apy upajanād asti nivṛttaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4146: sarvaṃ nānā na kaścid eko bhāvo vidyate/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4152: kumbha iti saṃjñāśabdo gandharasarūpasparśasamūhe budhnapārśvagrīvādisamūhe ca varttate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4157: anekavidhalakṣaṇair iti madhyamapadalopī samāsaḥ/ gandhādibhiś ca guṇair budhnādibhiś cāvayavaiḥ sambaddha eko bhāvo niṣpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4158: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyam avayavātiriktaś cāvayavīti/ vibhaktanyāyaṃ caitad ubhayam iti//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4164: na kaścid eko bhāva ity ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4165: lakṣaṇavyavasthānād eva/ yad iha lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvasya saṃjñāśabdabhūtaṃ tad ekasmin vyavasthitam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4166: yaṃ kumbham adrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmi yam evāsprākṣaṃ taṃ paśyāmīti nāṇusamūho gṛhyate iti/ aṇusamūhe cāgṛhyamāṇe yad gṛhyate tad ekam eveti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4167: athāpy etad anūktam nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samudāyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4168: ekānupapatter nāsty eva samūhaḥ --- nāsty eko bhāvo yasmāt samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogaḥ;ekasya cānupapatteḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4170: samūho nopapadyate ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti/ vyāhatatvād anupapannaṃ --- nāsty eko bhāva iti yasya pratiṣedhaḥ pratijñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4171: samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti hetuṃ bruvatā sa evābhyanujñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4172: ekasamuccayo hi samūha iti/ samūhe bhāvaśabdaprayogād iti ca samūham āśritya pratyekaṃ samūhipratiṣedho nāsty eko bhāva iti/ so 'yam ubhayato vyāghātād yatkiñcanavāda iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4178: yāvad bhāvajātaṃ tat sarvam abhāvaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4179_0: bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddheḥ / ``asan gaur aśvātmanā'' anaśvo gauḥ ``asann aśvo
GSP29nysvbh1u:4179_1: gavātmanā agaur aśvaḥ'' ity asatpratyayasya pratiṣedhasya ca bhāvaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:4183: pratijñāvākye padayoḥ pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātād ayuktam/ anekasyāśeṣatā sarvaśabdasyārtho,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4184: bhāvapratiṣedhaś cābhāvaśabdasyārthaḥ/ pūrvaṃ sopākhyam uttaraṃ nirupākhyaṃ tatra
GSP29nysvbh1u:4186: samupākhyāyamānaṃ kathaṃ nirupākhyam abhāvaḥ syād iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4187: na jātv abhāvo nirupākhyo 'nekatayāśeṣatayā śakyaḥ pratijñātum iti/ sarvam etad abhāva iti cet --- yad idaṃ sarvam iti manyase tadabhāva iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4189: anekam aśeṣaṃ ceti nābhāve pratyayena śakyaṃ bhavitum/ asti cāyaṃ pratyayaḥ sarvam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4191: pratijñāhetvoś ca vyāghātaḥ --- sarvam abhāva iti bhāvapratiṣedhaḥ pratijñā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4192_0: bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher iti hetuḥ / bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvam anujñāyāśritya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4192_1: ca itaretarābhāvasiddhyā sarvam abhāva ity ucyate / yadi sarvam abhāvo bhāveṣv itaretarābhāvasiddher
GSP29nysvbh1u:4198: svena bhāvena sadbhāvād bhāvānām/ svena dharmeṇa bhāvā bhavantīti pratijñāyate/ kaś ca svo dharmo bhāvānām?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4202: pratyekaṃ cānanto bhedaḥ/ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ ca viśiṣṭā dharmā gṛhyante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4204: so 'yam abhāvasya nirupākhyatvāt sampratyāyako 'rthabhedo na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4205: asti tv ayam, tasmān na sarvam abhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4206: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher bhāvānām iti svarūpasiddher iti/ gaur iti prayujyamāne śabde jātiviśiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4207: nābhāvamātram/ yadi ca sarvam abhāvaḥ gaur ity abhāvaḥ pratīyeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4208: gośabdena cābhāva ucyeta/ yasmāt tu gośabdaprayoge dravyaviśeṣaḥ pratīyate nābhāvas tasmād ayuktam iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4209: atha vā na svabhāvasiddher iti/ asan gaur aśvātmaneti gavātmanā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4211: anaśvo 'śva iti vā gaur agaur iti vā kasmān nocyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4212: avacanāt svena rūpeṇa vidyamānatā dravyasyeti vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4214_0: avyatirekapratiṣedhe ca bhāvena asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam bhāve saṃyogādisambandho
GSP29nysvbh1u:4214_1: vyatirekaḥ / atra avyatirekaḥ abhedākhyasambandhaḥ tatpratiṣedhe sadā ca asatpratyayasāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4215_0: yathā na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti / asan gaur aśvātmanā anaśvo gaur iti ca gavāśvayor
GSP29nysvbh1u:4215_1: avyatirekaḥ pratiṣidhyate gavāśvayor ekatvaṃ nāstīti / tasmin pratiṣidhyamāne bhāvena
GSP29nysvbh1u:4215_2: gavā sāmānādhikaraṇyam asatpratyayasya asan gaur aśvātmaneti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4216: yathā na santi kuṇḍe badarāṇīti kuṇḍe badarasaṃyoge pratiṣidhyamāne sadbhir asatpratyayasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti//38//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4221: apekṣākṛtam āpekṣikam/ hrasvāpekṣākṛtaṃ dīrghaṃ dīrghāpekṣākṛtaṃ hrasvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4223: apekṣāsāmarthyāt/ tasmān na svabhāvasiddhir bhāvānām iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4227: yadi hrasvāpekṣākṛtaṃ dīrghaṃ hrasvam anāpekṣikam/ kim idānīm apekṣya hrasvam iti gṛhyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4229: evam itaretarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4230: % retarāśrayayor ekābhāve anyatarābhāvād ubhayābhāva iti apekṣāvyavasthānupapannā/] p.984
GSP29nysvbh1u:4231: svabhāvasiddhāv asatyāṃ samayoḥ parimaṇḍalayor vā dravyayor āpekṣike dīrghatvahrasvatve kasmān na bhavataḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4232: apekṣāyām anapekṣāyāṃ ca dravyayor abhedaḥ/ yāvatī dravye apekṣamāṇe tāvatī evānapekṣamāṇe nānyataratra bhedaḥ/ āpekṣikatve tu saty anyataratra viśeṣopajanaḥ syād iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4235: dvayor grahaṇe 'tiśayagrahaṇopapattiḥ/ dve dravye paśyann ekatra vidyamānam atiśayaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dīrgham iti vyavasyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4236: yac ca hīnaṃ gṛhṇāti tad dhrasvam iti vyavasyatīti/ etac cāpekṣāsāmarthyam iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4243: sarvaṃ dvedhā nityānityabhedāt/ sarvaṃ tredhā jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyam iti/ sarvaṃ caturddhā pramātā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ pramitir iti/ evaṃ yathāsambhavam anye 'pīti/ tatra parīkṣā ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4246: yadi sādhyasādhanayor nānātvam, ekānto na siddhyati vyatirekāt/ atha
GSP29nysvbh1u:4249: evam apy ekānto na sidhyati sādhanābhāvāt, na hi hetum antareṇa kasyacit siddhir iti//41//

GSP29nysvbh1u:4497_0: pramāṇena prāmāṇyābhyanujñānāt --- pramāṇena khalu brāhmaṇenetihāsapurāṇasya prāmāṇyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:4497_1: abhyanujñāyate ``te vā khalv ete atharvāṅgirasa etad itihāsapurāṇam abhyavadann itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4497_2: pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ veda iti'' / tasmād ayuktam etadaprāmāṇyam iti / aprāmāṇye ca dharmaśāstrasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4499: draṣṭṛpravaktṛsāmāṇyāc cāprāmānyānupapattiḥ/ ye eva mantrabrāhmaṇasya draṣṭāraḥ pravaktāraś ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4501: viṣayavyavasthānāc ca yathāviṣayaṃ prāmāṇyam/ anyo mantrabrāhmaṇasya viṣayo 'nyac cetihāsapurāṇadharmaśāstrāṇām iti/ yajño mantrabrāhmaṇasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4503: lokavyavahāravyavasthānaṃ dharmaśāstrasya viṣayaḥ/ tatraikena na sarvaṃ vyavasthāpyate iti yathāviṣayam etāni pramāṇānīndriyādivad iti//61//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4509: yathā suṣuptasya khalu svapnādarśane rāgānubandhaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubandhaś ca vicchidyate tathāpavarge 'pīti/ etac ca brahmavido muktasyātmano rūpam udāharantīti//62//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4515: prakṣīṇeṣu rāgadveṣamoheṣu pravṛttir na pratisandhānāya/ pratisandhis tu pūrvajanmanivṛttau punarjanma,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4521: sarvāṇi pūrvakarmāṇi hy ante janmani pipacyanta iti//63//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4527: kleśasantateḥ svābhāvikatvāt/ anādir iyaṃ kleśasantatiḥ, na cānādiḥ śakya ucchetum iti//64//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4531: NyS_4,1.65: prāg utpatter abhāvānityatvavat svābhāvike 'py anityatvam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:4532: yathānādiḥ prāg utpatter abhāva utpannena bhāvena nivartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4540: tathā kleśasantatir apīti/ sataḥ khalu dharmo nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4541: tattvaṃ bhāve abhāve bhāktam iti/ anādir aṇuśyāmateti hetvabhāvād ayuktam/ anutpattidharmakam anityam iti nātra hetur astīti//66//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4547: karmanimittatvād itaretaranimittatvāc ceti samuccayaḥ/ mithyāsaṅkalpebhyo rañjanīyakopanīyamohanīyebhyo rāgadveṣamohā utpadyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4548: karma ca sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ naiyamikān rāgadveṣamohān nirvarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4549_0: niyamadarśanāt / dṛśyate hi kaścit sattvanikāyo rāgabahulaḥ kaścid dveṣabahulaḥ kaścin
GSP29nysvbh1u:4549_1: mohabahula iti / itaretaranimittā ca rāgādīnām utpattiḥ / mūḍho rajyati mūḍhaḥ kupyati
GSP29nysvbh1u:4551: sarvamithyāsaṅkalpānāṃ tattvajñānād anutpattiḥ kāraṇānutpātau ca kāryānutpatter iti rāgādīnām atyantam anutpattir iti/ anādiś ca kleśasantatir ity ayuktam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4552: sarve ime khalv ādhyātmikā bhāvā anādinā prabandhena pravarttante śarīrādayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4553_0: na jātv atra kaścid anutpannapūrvaḥ prathamata utpadyate 'nyatra tattvajñānāt / na
GSP29nysvbh1u:4553_1: caivaṃ saty anutpattidharmakaṃ kiñcid avyayadharmakaṃ pratijñāyate iti / karma ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:4553_2: sattvanikāyanirvartakaṃ tattvajñānakṛtān mithyāsaṅkalpavighātān na rāgādyutpattinimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4559: kiṃ nu khalu bhoḥ yāvanto viṣayās tāvatsu pratyekaṃ tattvajñānam utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4560: atha kvacid utpadyata iti/ kaś cātra viśeṣaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4561: na tāvad ekaikatra yāvad viṣayam utpadyate jñeyānām ānantyāt/ nāpi kvacid utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4562: yatra notpadyate tatrānivṛtto moha iti mohaśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ/ na cānyaviṣayeṇa tattvajñānenānyaviṣayo mohaḥ śakyaḥ pratiṣeddhum iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4564: mithyājñānaṃ vai khalu moho na tattvajñānasyānutpattimātram/ tac ca mithyājñānaṃ yatra viṣaye pravartamānaṃ saṃsārabījaṃ bhavati sa viṣayas tattvato jñeya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4567: aham asmīti moho 'haṅkāra iti/ anātmānaṃ khalv aham asmīti paśyato dṛṣṭir ahaṅkāra iti/ kiṃ punas tadarthajātaṃ yadviṣayo 'haṅkāraḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4570: ayaṃ khalu śarīrādyarthajātam aham asmīti vyavasitaḥ taducchedenātmocchedaṃ manyamāno 'nucchedatṛṣṇāpariplutaḥ punaḥ punas tad upādatte,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4572_0: tenāviyogān nātyantaṃ duḥkhād vimucyata iti / yas tu duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4572_1: sukhaṃ ca sarvam idaṃ duḥkham iti paśyati sa duḥkhaṃ parijānati / parijñātaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4572_2: prahīṇaṃ bhavaty anupādānāt saviṣānnavat / evaṃ doṣān karma ca duḥkhahetur iti paśyati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4572_3: na cāprahīṇeṣu doṣeṣu duḥkhaprabandhocchedena śakyaṃ bhavitum iti doṣān jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4573: prahīṇeṣu ca doṣeṣu na pravṛttiḥ pratisandhānāyety uktam/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4574_0: pretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāni ca jñeyāni vyavasthāpayati karma ca doṣāṃś ca praheyān /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4574_1: apavargo 'dhigantavyas tasyādhigamopāyas tattvajñānam / evaṃ catasṛbhir vidhābhiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4574_2: prameyaṃ vibhaktam āsevamānasyābhyasyato bhāvayataḥ samyagdarśanaṃ yathābhūtāvabodhas
GSP29nysvbh1u:4578_0: śarīrādiduḥkhāntaṃ prameyaṃ doṣanimittaṃ tadviṣayatvān mithyājñānasya / tad idaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:4578_1: tattvajñānaṃ tadviṣayam utpannam ahaṅkāraṃ nivartayati samānaviṣaye tayor virodhāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4578_3: apavarga'' iti / sa cāyaṃ śāstrārthasaṃgraho 'nūdyate nāpūrvo vidhīyate iti //1 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4584: kāmaviṣayā indriyārthā iti rūpādaya ucyante/ te mithyā saṅkalpyamānā rāgadveṣamohān pravartayanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4585_0: tān pūrvaṃ prasañcakṣīta / tāṃś ca prasañcakṣāṇasya rūpādiviṣayo mithyāsaṅkalpo nivartate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4585_1: tannivṛttāv adhyātmaṃ śarīrādi prasañcakṣīta / tatprasaṅkhyānād adhyātmaviṣayo 'haṅkāro nivartate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4587: so 'yam adhyātmaṃ bahiś ca viviktacitto viharan mukta ity ucyate//2//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4590: ataḥ paraṃ kācit saṃjñā heyā kācid bhāvayitavyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4593: teṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ nimittaṃ tv avayavyabhimānaḥ/ sā ca khalu strīsaṃjñā sapariṣkārā puruṣasya,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4594: puruṣasaṃjñā ca striyāḥ sapariṣkārā nimittasaṃjñā anuvyañjanasaṃjñā ca/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4598: cakṣurnāsikam/ anuvyañjanasaṃjñā --- itthaṃ daṇḍā ittham oṣṭhāv iti/ seyaṃ saṃjñā kāmaṃ vardhayati tadanuṣaktāṃś ca doṣān vivarjanīyān,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4601: tām aśubhasaṃjñety ācakṣate/ tām asya bhāvayataḥ kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4602: saty eva ca dvividhe viṣaye kācit saṃjñā bhāvanīyā kācit parivarjanīyety upadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4610: sadasator anupalambhād avidyāpi dvividhā/ upalambhyamāne 'vayavini vidyādvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4611: anupalabhyamāne cāvidyādvaividhyāt saṃśayaḥ/ so 'yam avayavī *yad upalabhyate (following ṭhakur,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4613: athāpi nopalabhyate na kathañcana saṃśayān mucyata iti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4618: tasminn anupapannaḥ saṃśayaḥ/ kasmāt? pūrvoktahetūnām apratiṣedhād asti dravyāntarārambha iti//5//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4623: vṛttyanupapatter api tarhi saṃśayānupapattir nāsty avayavīti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4629: tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād avayavāntarasambandhābhāvaprasaṅgāc ca/ nāpy avayavyekadeśena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4630: na hy asyānye avayavā ekadeśabhūtāḥ santīti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4637: tayoḥ parimāṇabhedād dravyasya caikadravyatvaprasaṅgāt/ nāpy ekadeśaiḥ sarveṣu anyāvayavābhāvāt/ tad evaṃ na yuktaḥ saṃśayo nāsty avayavīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4642: avayavyabhāva iti vartate/ na cāyaṃ pṛthag avayavebhyo vartate agrahaṇāt nityatvaprasaṅgāc ca/ tasmān nāsty avayavīti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4648: dharmamātrasya dharmibhir avayavaiḥ pūrvavat sambandhānupapatteḥ/ pṛthak cāvayavebhyo dharmibhyo dharmasyāgrahaṇād iti samānam//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4653: kiṃ pratyavayavaṃ kṛtsno 'vayavī vartate athaikadeśeneti nopapadyate praśnaḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4654: ekasmin bhedābhāvād bhedaśabdaprayogānupapatteḥ/ kṛtsnam ity anekasyāśeṣābhidhānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4655: ekadeśa iti nānātve kasyacid abhidhānam/ tāv imau kṛtsnaikadeśaśabdau bhedaviṣayau naikasminn avayaviny uapapadyete bhedābhāvād iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4660: avayavāntarābhāvād iti/ yady api ekadeśo 'vayavāntarabhūtaḥ syāt tathāpy avayave 'vayavāntaraṃ vartate nāvayavīti anyo 'vayavīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4662: anyāvayavabhāve 'py avṛtter avayavino naikadeśena vṛttir anyāvayavābhāvād ity ahetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4664: ekasyānekatrāśrayāśritasambandhalakṣaṇā prāptiḥ/ āśrayāśritabhāvaḥ katham iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4665: yasya yato 'nyatrātmalābhānupapattiḥ sa āśrayaḥ/ na kāraṇadravyebhyo 'nyatra kāryadravyam ātmānaṃ labhate viparyayas tu kāraṇadravyeṣv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4666: nityeṣu katham iti cet, anityeṣu darśanāt siddham, nityeṣu dravyeṣu katham āśrayāśrayibhāva iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4667: anityeṣu dravyaguṇeṣu darśanād āśrayāśritabhāvasya nityeṣu siddhir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4671: yathā rūpādiṣu mithyāsaṅkalpo na rūpādaya iti//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4675: sarvāgrahaṇam avayavyasiddher iti pratyavasthito 'py etad āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4677: yathaikaikaḥ keśas taimirikeṇa nopalabhyate keśasamūhas tūpalabhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4684: svaviṣayān atikrameṇendiryasya paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāavo nāviṣaye pravṛttiḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:4685: yathāviṣayam indriyāṇāṃ paṭumandabhāvād viṣayagrahaṇānāṃ paṭumandabhāvo bhavati/ cakṣuḥ khalu prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ nāviṣayaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4686: nikṛṣyamāṇaṃ ca na svaviṣayāt pracyavate/ so 'yaṃ taimirikaḥ kaścic cakṣur viṣayaṃkeśaṃ na gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4689: ubhayaṃ hy ataimimirikeṇa caks.uṣā gṛhyate/ paramāṇavas tv atīndriyā indriyāviṣayabhūtā na kenacid indriyeṇa gṛhyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4691: ity aviṣaye pravṛttir indriyasya prasajyeta/ na jātv arthāntaram aṇubhyo gṛhyata iti/ te khalv ime paramāṇavaḥ sannihitā gṛhyamāṇā atīndriyatvaṃ jahati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4692: viyuktāś cāgṛhyamāṇā indriyaviṣayatvaṃ na labhanta iti/ so 'yaṃ dravyāntarānutpattāv atimahān vyāghāta ity upapadyate dravyāantaram yad grahaṇasya viṣaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4694: sañcayasya saṃyogabhāvāt tasya cātīndriyasyāgrahaṇād ayuktam/ sañcayaḥ khalv anekasya saṃyogaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4696: bhavati hīdam anena saṃyuktam iti/ tasmād yuktam etad iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4698: gṛhyamāṇasya cendriyeṇa viṣayasyāvaraṇādyanupalabdhikāraṇam upalabhyate/ tasmān nendriyadaurbalyād anupalabdhir aṇūnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4703: yaḥ khalv avayavino 'vayaveṣu vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ so 'yam avayavasyāvayaveṣu prasajyamānaḥ sarvapralayāya vā kalpeta,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4704: niravayavād vā paramāṇuto nivarteta/ ubhayathā copalabdhiviṣayasyābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4706: sa āśrayaṃ vyāghnan ātmaghātāya kalpata iti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4712: avayavavibhāgam āśritya vṛttipratiṣedhād abhāvaḥ prasajyamāno niravayavāt paramāṇor nivartate na sarvapralayāya kalpate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4713_0: niravayavatvaṃ tu paramāṇor vibhāgair alpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4713_1: loṣṭasya khalu pravibhajyamānāvayavasyālpataram alpatamam uttaram uttaraṃ bhavati /
GSP29nysvbh1u:4713_2: sa cāyam alpataraprasaṅgaḥ yasmān nālpataram asti yaḥ paramo 'lpas tatra nivartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4714: yataś ca nālpīyo 'sti taṃ parama'nuṃ pracakṣmahe iti//16\\
GSP29nysvbh1u:4723: athedānīm ānupalambhikaḥ sarvaṃ nāstīti manyamāna āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4726: ākāśavyatibhedāt/ antar bahiś cāṇur ākāśena samāviṣṭo vyatibhinnaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4733: athaitan neṣyate --- paramāṇor antar nāsty ākāśam ity asarvagatatvaṃ prasajyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4736: NyS_4,2.20: antar bahiś ca kāryadravyasya kāraṇāntaravacanād akārye tadabhāvaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:4737: ``antar'' iti pihitaṃ kāraṇāntaraiḥ kāraṇam ucyate/ ``bahir'' iti ca vyavadhāyakam avyavahitaṃ kāraṇam evocyate/ tad etat kāryadravyasya sambhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4738: nāṇor akāryatvāt/ akārye hi paramāṇāv antar bahir ity asyābhāvaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4740: yatra cāsya bhāvo 'nukāryaṃ tat, na paramāṇuḥ, yato hi nālpataram asti sa paramāṇur iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:4745: yatra kvacid utpannāḥ śabdā vibhavanty ākāśe --- tadāśrayā bhavanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4746: manobhiḥ paramāṇubhis tatkāryaiś ca saṃyogā vibhavanty ākāśe,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4752: saṃsarpatā pratighātinā dravyeṇa na vyuhyate, yathā kāṣṭhenodakam/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4753: niravayavatvāt/ sarpac ca pratighāti na viṣṭambhāti --- nāsya kriyāhetuṃ guṇaṃ pratibadhnāti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4756: asparśatvāt/ viparyaye hi viṣṭambho dṛṣṭa iti sa bhavān sāvayave sparśavati dravye dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ viparīte nāśāṅkitum arhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4757: aṇvavayavasyāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād anukāryapratiṣedhaḥ/ sāvayavatve cāṇor aṇvavayavo 'nutara iti prasajyate/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4759: yas tu sāvayavo 'nukāryaṃ tad iti/ tasmād anukāryam idaṃ pratiṣidhyata iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4767: paricchinnānāṃ hi sparśavatāṃ saṃsthānaṃ trikoṇaṃ caturasraṃ samaṃ parimaṇḍalam ity upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4773: madhye sann aṇuḥ pūrvāparābhyām aṇubhyām saṃyuktas tayor vyavadhānaṃ kurute/ vyavadhānenānumīyate pūrvabhāgena pūrveṇāṇunā saṃyujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4775: yau tau pūrvāparau bhāgau tāv asyāvayavau,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4776: evaṃ sarvataḥ saṃyujyamānasya sarvato bhāgā avayavā iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4779: vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatra nivṛtter aṇavayavasya cāṇutaratvaprasaṅgād aṇukāryapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4782_0: sparśavattvād vyavadhānam āśrayasya cāvyāptyā bhāgabhaktiḥ / uktaṃ cātra sparśavān
GSP29nysvbh1u:4782_1: aṇuḥ sparśavator aṇvoḥ pratighātād vyavadhāyako na sāvayavatvāt / sparśavattvāc ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:4782_2: vyavadhāne saty aṇusaṃyogo nāśrayaṃ vyāpnotīti bhāgabhaktir bhavati bhāgavānn ivāyam
GSP29nysvbh1u:4782_3: iti / uktaṃ cātra vibhāge 'lpataraprasaṅgasya yato nālpīyas tatrāvasthānāt tadavayavasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4785: mūrtimatāṃ ca saṃsthānopapatteḥ saṃyogopapatteś ca paramāṇūnāṃ sāvayavatvam iti hetvoḥ ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:4787: yāvan mūrtimad yāvac ca saṃyujyate tat sarvaṃ sāvayavam ity anavasthākāriṇāv imau hetū,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4788: sā cānavasthā nopapadyate/ satyām anavasthāyāṃ satyau hetū syātām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4791: vibhāgasya ca vibhajyamānahānir nopapadyate tasmāt pralayāntatā nopapadyata iti/

GSP29nysvbh1u:4797: yad idaṃ bhavān buddhīr āśritya buddhiviṣayāḥ santīti manyate mithyābuddhaya etāḥ,

GSP29nysvbh1u:4803: yathāyaṃ tantur ayaṃ tantur iti pratyekaṃ tantuṣu vivicyamāneṣu nārthāntaraṃ kiñcid upalabhyate --- yat paṭabuddher viṣayaḥ syāt,

GSP29nysvbh1u:4809_1: yāthātmyānupalabdhir na buddhyā vivecanam / bhāvānāṃ buddhyā vivecanaṃ yāthātmyānupalabdhiś ceti vyāhanyate /

GSP29nysvbh1u:4817: yatrāśrayāśritabhāvo nāsti tatra pṛthaggrahaṇam iti/ buddhyā vivecanāt tu bhāvānāṃ pṛthaggrahaṇam atīndriyeṣv aṇuṣu,

GSP29nysvbh1u:4823: yad asti yathā ca yan nāsti yathā ca tat sarvaṃ pramāṇata upalabdhyā sidhyati,

GSP29nysvbh1u:4825: tena sarvaśāstrāṇi sarvakarmāṇi sarve ca śarīriṇāṃ vyavahārā vyāptāḥ/ parīkṣamāṇo hi buddhyādhyavasyatīdam astīdaṃ nāstīti tatra na sarvabhāvānupapattiḥ// 29 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4830: evaṃ ca sati sarvaṃ nāstīti nopapadyate, kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4831: pramāṇānupapattyupapattibhyām/ yadi sarvaṃ nāstīti pramāṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4832: sarvaṃ nāstīti etad vyāhanyate/ atha pramāṇaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4834: atha pramāṇam antareṇa siddhiḥ, sarvam astīty asya kathaṃ na siddhiḥ?// 30 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4838: yathā svapne na viṣayāḥ santy atha cābhimāno bhavati,

GSP29nysvbh1u:4847_0: svapnānte viṣayābhimānavat pramāṇaprameyābhimāno na punar jāgaritānte viṣayopalabdhivad
GSP29nysvbh1u:4847_1: ity atra hetur nāsti / hetvabhāvād asiddhiḥ / svapnānte cāsanto viṣayā upalabhyanta

GSP29nysvbh1u:4859: kadācit svapnam eva na paśyatīti/ nimittavatas tu svapnaviṣayābhimānasya nimittavikalpād vikalpopapattiḥ// 33 //

GSP29nysvbh1u:4864_1: pratyākhyānāya kalpete tathā svapne viṣayagrahaṇaṃ pūrvopalabdhaviṣayaṃ na tasya

GSP29nysvbh1u:4866_1: jāgrat svapnadarśanāni pratisandhatta idam adrākṣam iti / tatra jāgradbuddhivṛttivaśāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:4866_2: svapnaviṣayābhimāno mithyeti vyavasāyaḥ / sati ca pratisandhāne yā jāgrato buddhivṛttis
GSP29nysvbh1u:4868: ubhayāviśeṣe tu sādhanānarthakyam/ yasya svapnāntajāgaritāntayor aviśeṣas tasya svapnaviṣayābhimānavad iti sādhanam anarthakaṃ tadāśrayapratyākhyānāt/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4869: atasmiṃs tad iti ca vyavasāyaḥ pradhānāśrayaḥ/ apuruṣe sthāṇau puruṣa iti vyavasāyaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4871: na khalu puruṣe 'nupalabdhe puruṣa ity apuruṣe vyavasāyo bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4872: evaṃ svapnaviṣayasya vyavasāyo hastinam adrākṣaṃ parvatam adrākṣam iti pradhānāśrayo bhavitum arhati// 34 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4878: sthāṇau pruṣo 'yam iti vyavasāyo mithyopalabdhiḥ atasmiṃs tad iti jñānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4879: sthāṇau sthāṇur iti vyavasāyas tattvajñānam/ tattvajjānena ca mithyopalabdhir nivartyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4880: nārthaḥ sthāṇupuruṣasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ/ yathā pratibodhe yā jñānavṛttis tayā svapnaviṣayābhimāno nivartyate nārtho viṣayasāmānyalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4881: tathā māyāgandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāṇām api yā buddhayo 'tasmiṃs tad iti vyavasāyās tatrāpy anenaiva kalpena mithyopalabdhivināśas tattvajñānān nārthapratiṣedha iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4882: upādānavac ca māyādiṣu mithyājñānam/ prajñāpanīyasarūpaṃ ca dravyam upādāya sādhanavān aparasya mithyādhyavasāyaṃ karoti sā māyā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4883: nīhāraprabhṛtīnāṃ nagarasarūpasanniveśe dūrān nagarabuddhir utpadyate viparyaye tadabhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4884: sūryamarīciṣu bhaumenoṣmaṇā saṃsṛṣṭeṣu spandamāneṣūdakabuddhir bhavati sāmānyagrahaṇāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4887: kvacit kadācit kasyacic ca bhāvān nānimittaṃ mithyājñānam/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca buddhidvaitaṃ māyāprayoktuḥ parasya ca,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4889: suputapratibuddhayoś ca svapnaviṣaye/ tad etat sarvasyābhāve nirupākhyatāyāṃ nirātmakatve nopapadyata iti// 35 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4895: sadbhāvopalambhāc ca/ upalabhyate hi mithyābuddhinimittaṃ mithyābuddhiś ca pratyātmam utpannā gṛhyate saṃvedyatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4902: pradhānaṃ puruṣa iti/ tattvapradhānayor alopād bhedāt sthāṇau puruṣa iti mithyābuddhir utpadyate sāmānyagrahaṇāt/ evaṃ patākāyāṃ balāketi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:4903: loṣṭe kapota iti na tu samāne viṣaye mithyābuddhīnāṃ samāveśaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇavyavasthānāt/ yasya tu nirātmakaṃ nirupākhyaṃ sarvaṃ tasya samāveśaḥ prasajyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:4905_0: gandhādau ca prameye gandhādibuddayo mithyābhimatās tattvapradhānayoḥ sāmānyagrahaṇasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:4905_1: cābhāvāt tattvabuddhaya eva bhavanti / tasmād ayuktam etat --- pramāṇaprameyabuddhayo mithyeti // 37 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:4908: doṣanimittānāṃ tattvajñānād ahaṅkāranivṛttir ity uktam/ atha kathaṃ tattvajñānam utpadyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:4910: sa tu pratyāhṛtasyendriyebhyo manaso dhārakeṇa prayatnena dhāryamāṇasyātmanā saṃyogas tattvabubhutsāviśiṣṭaḥ/

GSP29nysvbh1u:4924: kṣutpipāsābhyāṃ śītoṣṇābhyāṃ vyādhibhiś cānicchato 'pi buddhayaḥ pravartante tasmād aikāgryānupapattir iti// 40 //

GSP29nysvbh1u:4931: , niṣphale hy abhyāse nābhyāsam ādriyeran/ dṛṣṭaṃ hi laukikeṣu karmasv abhyāsasāmarthyam// 41 //

GSP29nysvbh1u:5003: sādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ/ aviśeṣaṃ tatra tatrodāhariṣyāmaḥ/ evaṃ vaidharmyasamaprabhṛtayo 'pi nirvaktavyāḥ//1//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5010: sādharmyeṇopasaṃhāre sādhyadharmaviparyayopapatteḥ sādharmyeṇaiva pratyavasthānam aviśiṣyamāṇaṃ sthāpanāhetutaḥ sādharmyasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ nidarśanam kriyāvān ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5011: dravyasya kriyāhetuguṇayogāt/ dravyaṃ loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaḥ kriyāvān,

GSP29nysvbh1u:5021: tasmān na loṣṭavat kriyāvān iti/ na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvatā bhavitavyaṃ na punaḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyād akriyeṇeti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5024: kriyāvad dravyam avibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5026: tasmān niṣkriya iti/ vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam --- niṣkriyaṃ dravyam ākāśaṃ kriyāhetuguṇarahitaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5028: tasmān na niṣkriya iti/ na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyeṇa bhavitavyaṃ na punar akriyavaidharmyāt kriyāvateti viśeṣahetvabhāvād vaidharmyasamaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5030: atha sādharmyasamaḥ --- kriyāvān loṣṭaḥ kriyāhetuguṇayukto dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5032: tasmāt kriyāvān iti/ na cāsti viśeṣahetuḥ kriyāvadvaidharmyān niṣkriyo na punaḥ kriyāvatsādharmyāt kriyāvān iti viśeṣahetvabhāvāt sādharmyasamaḥ//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5037: sādharmyamātreṇa vaidharmyamātreṇa ca sādhyasādhane pratijñāyamāne syād avyavasthā,

GSP29nysvbh1u:5042: na guṇādibhedāt/ tac caitat kṛtavyākhyānam avayavaprakaraṇe/ pramāṇānām abhisambandhāc caikārthakāritvaṃ samānaṃ vākya iti/ hetvābhāsāśrayā khalv iyam avyavastheti//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5049: dṛṣṭāntadharmaṃ sādhye samāsañjayata utkarṣasamaḥ/ yadi kriyāhetuguṇayogāl loṣṭavat kriyāvān ātmā,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5050: loṣṭavad eva sparśavān api prāpnoti/ atha na sparśavān,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5053: sādhye dharmābhāvaṃ dṛṣṭāntāt prasañjayato 'pakarṣasamaḥ/ loṣṭaḥ khalu kriyāvān avibhur dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5055: kāmam ātmāpi kriyāvān avibhur astu, viparyaye vā viśeṣo vaktavya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5056: khyāpanīyo varṇyo viparyayād avarṇyaḥ/ tāv etau sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmau viparyasyato varṇyāvarṇyasamau bhavataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5057: sādhanadharmayukte dṛṣṭānte dharmāntaravikalpāt sādhyadharmavikalpaṃ prasañjayato vikalpasamaḥ/ kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcid guru yathā loṣṭaḥ,

GSP29nysvbh1u:5071: alabhyaḥ siddhasya nihnavaḥ/ siddhaṃ ca kiñcitsādharmyād upamānaṃ yathā gaus tathā gavaya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5073_0: tatra na labhyo gogavayayor dharmavikalpaś codayitum / evaṃ sādhake dharme dṛṣṭāntādisāmarthyayukte
GSP29nysvbh1u:5073_1: na labhyaḥ sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor dharmavikalpād vaidharmyāt pratiṣedho vaktum iti //5 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5077: yatra laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ buddhisāmyaṃ tenāviparīto 'rtho 'tidiśyate prajñāpanārtham/ evaṃ sādhyātideśād dṛṣṭānte upapadyamāne sādhyatvam anupapannam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5082: 1.7: prāpya sādhyam aprāpya vā hetoḥ prāptyāviśiṣṭatvād aprāptyāsādhakatvāc ca prāptyaprāptisamau ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5083: hetuḥ prāpya vā sādhyaṃ sādhayed aprāpya vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5084: na tāvat prāpya prāptyām aviśiṣṭatvād asādhakaḥ/ dvayor vidyamānayoḥ prāptau satyāṃ kiṃ kasya sādhakaṃ sādhyaṃ vā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5086: nāprāptaḥ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti/ prāptyā pratyavasthānaṃ prāptisamaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5093: ubhayathā khalv ayuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇāni prāpya mṛdaṃ ghaṭādikāryaṃ niṣpādayanti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5094: abhicārāc ca pīḍane sati dṛṣṭam aprāpya sādhakatvam iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5099: 1.9: dṛṣṭāntasya kāraṇānapadeśāt pratyavasthānāc ca pratidṛṣṭāntena prasaṅgapratidṛṣṭāntasamau ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5100: sādhanasyāpi sādhanaṃ vaktavyam iti prasaṅgena pratyavasthānaṃ prasaṅgasamaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ kriyāhetuguṇayogī kriyāvān loṣṭa iti hetur nāpadiśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5101: na ca hetum antereṇa siddhir astīti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5103_0: pratidṛṣṭāntena pratyavasthānaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntasamaḥ / kriyāvān ātmā kriyāhetuguṇayogād
GSP29nysvbh1u:5103_1: loṣṭavad ity ukte pratidṛṣṭānta upādīyate --- kriyāhetuguṇayuktam ākāśaṃ niṣkriyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5103_2: dṛṣṭam iti / kaḥ punar ākāśasya kriyāhetuguṇaḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5110: idaṃ tāvad ayaṃ pṛṣṭo vaktum arhati, atha ke pradīpam upādadate, kimarthaṃ veti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5111: didṛkṣamāṇā dṛśyadarśanārtham iti/ atha pradīpaṃ didṛkṣamāṇāḥ pradīpāntaraṃ kasmān nopādadate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5113: tatra pradīpadarśanārthaṃ pradīpopādānaṃ nirarthakam/ atha dṛṣṭāntaḥ kimartham ucyata iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5114: aprajñātasya jñāpanārtham iti/ atha dṛṣṭānte kāraṇāpadeśaḥ kimarthaṃ deśyate?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5116: prajñāto dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ sa khalu ``laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭānta'' iti/ tatprajñāpanārthaḥ kāraṇāpadeśo nirarthaka iti prasaṅgasamasyottaram//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5123: --- anena prakāreṇa pratidṛṣṭānataḥ sādhako na dṛṣṭānta iti/ evaṃ pratidṛṣṭāntahetutve nāhetur dṛṣṭānta ity upapadyate/ sa ca katham ahetur na syāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5129: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte apara āha --- prāgutpatter anutpanne śabde prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5131: nityasya cotpattir nāsti/ anutpattyā pratyavasthānam anutpattisamaḥ//12//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5136: NyS_5,1.13: tathābhāvād utpannasya kāraṇopapatter na kāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5137: tathābhāvād utpannasyeti/ utpannaḥ khalv ayaṃ śabda iti bhavati/ prāgutapatteḥ śabda eva nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5138: utpannasya śabdabhāvāc chabdasya sataḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvam anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5143: NyS_5,1.14: sāmānyadṛṣṭāntayor aindriyakatve samāne nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5144: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ukte hetau saṃśayena pratyavatiṣṭate --- sati prayatnānantarīyakatve asty evāsya nityena sāmānyena sādharmyam aindriyakatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5153: sādharmyāt saṃśaye na saṃśayo vaidharmyād ubhayathā vā saṃśaye 'tyantasaṃśayaprasaṅgo nityatvānabhyupagamāc ca sāmānysyāpratiṣedhaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5155_0: na sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ labhate / evaṃ vaidharmyād viśeṣāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād
GSP29nysvbh1u:5155_1: avadhāryamāṇe śabdasyānityatve nityānityasādharmyāt saṃśayo 'vakāśaṃ na labhate / yadi vai labhate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5156_0: tataḥ sthāṇupuruṣasādharmyānucchedād atyantaṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt / gṛhyamāṇe ca viśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:5156_1: nityaṃ sādharmyaṃ saṃśayahetur iti nābhyupagamyate / na hi gṛhyamāṇe puruṣasya viśeṣe
GSP29nysvbh1u:5161: ubhayena nityena cānityena ca sādharmyāt pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ pravṛttiḥ prakriyā/ anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad ity ekaḥ pakṣaṃ pravarttayati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5162_0: dvitīyaś ca nityasādharmyāt pratipakṣaṃ pravarttayati --- nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:5162_1: śabdatvavad iti / evaṃ ca sati prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur anityasādharmyeṇa
GSP29nysvbh1u:5163: prakaraṇānativṛtter nirṇayānativartanam/ samānaṃ caitan nityasādharmyeṇocyamāṇe hetau/ tad idaṃ prakaraṇānativṛttyā pratyavasthānaṃ prakaraṇasamaḥ/ samānaṃ caitad vaidharmye 'pi,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5170: ubhayasādharmyāt prakriyāsiddhiṃ bruvatā pratipakṣāt prakriyāsiddhir uktā bhavati/ yady ubhayasādharmyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5171: tatra ekataraḥ pratipakṣa ity evaṃ saty upapannaḥ pratipakṣo bhavati/ pratipakṣopapatter anupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5174: pratipakṣopapattiḥ pratiṣedhopapattiś ceti vipratiṣiddham iti/ tattvānavadhāraṇāc ca prakriyāsiddhir viparyaye prakaraṇāvasānāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5181: tat sādhyāt pūrvaṃ paścāt saha vā bhavet/ yadi pūrvaṃ sādhanam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5183: atha paścād, asati sādhane kasyedaṃ sādhyam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5185: dvayor vidyamānayoḥ kiṃ kasya sādhanaṃ kiṃ kasya sādhyam iti hetur ahetunā na viśiṣyate/ ahetunā sādharmyāt pratyavasthānam ahetusamaḥ//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5192: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddheḥ/ nirvartanīyasya nirvṛttir vijñeyasya vijñānam ubhayaṃ kāraṇato dṛśyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5193: so 'yaṃ mahān pratyakṣaviṣaya udāharaṇam iti/ yat tu khalūktam asati sādhye kasya sādhanam iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5194: yat tu nirvatyate yac ca vijñāpyate tasyeti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5198: pūrvaṃ paścād yugapad vā pratiṣedha iti nopapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5204_0: anityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād ghaṭavad iti sthāpite pakṣe arthāpattyā pratipakṣaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5204_1: sādhayato 'rthāpattisamaḥ / yadi prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityasādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5206: asti cāsya nityena sādharmyam asparśatvam iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5211: NyS_5,1.22: anuktasyārthāpatteḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvād anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5212: anupapādya sāmarthyam anuktam arthād āpadyate iti bruvataḥ pakṣahāner upapattir anuktatvāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5213: anityapakṣasiddhāv arthād āpannaṃ nityapakṣasya hānir iti/ anaikānatikatvāc cārthāpatteḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5215_0: ubhayapakṣasamā ceyam arthāpattiḥ / yadi nityasādharmyād asparśatvād ākāśavac ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:5215_1: nityaḥ śabdaḥ arthād āpannam anityasādharmyāt prayatnānantarīyakatvād anitya iti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5215_2: na ceyaṃ viparyayamātrād ekāntenārthāpattiḥ / na khalu vai ghaṇasya grāvṇaḥ patanam
GSP29nysvbh1u:5215_3: ity arthād āpadyate --- dravāṇām apāṃ patanābhāva iti //22 //
GSP29nysvbh1u:5218: NyS_5,1.23: ekadharmopapatter aviśeṣe sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt sadbhāvaupapatter aviśeṣasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5219: eko dharmaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ śabdaghaṭayor upapadyata ity aviśeṣe ubhayor anityatve,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5227: NyS_5,1.24: kvacit taddharmopapatteḥ kvacic cānupapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5228: yathā sādhyadṛṣṭāntayor ekadharmasya prayatnānantarīyakatvasyopapatter anityatvaṃ dharmāntaram aviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5231: atha matam anityatvam eva dharmānataraṃ sadbhāvopapattinimittaṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra syād iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5232: evaṃ khalu vai kalpyamāne anityāḥ sarve bhāvāḥ sadbhāvopapatter iti pakṣaḥ prāpnoti/ tatra pratijñārthavyatiriktam anyad udāharaṇaṃ nāsti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5233: anudāharaṇaś ca hetur nāstīti/ pratijñaiekadeśasya codāharaṇatvam anupapannam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5235_0: na hi sādhyam udāharaṇaṃ bhavati / sataś ca nityānityabhāvāt anityatvānupapattiḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5235_1: tasmāt sadbhāvopapatteḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga iti nirabhidheyam etad vākyam iti / sarvabhāvānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5241_0: yady anityatvakāraṇam upapadyate śabdasyety anityaḥ śabdo nityatvakāraṇam apy upapadyate
GSP29nysvbh1u:5241_1: 'syāsparśatvam iti nityatvam apy upapadyate / ubhayasyānityatvasya nityatvasya ca
GSP29nysvbh1u:5246: ubhayakāraṇopapatter iti bruvatā nānityatvakāraṇopapatter anityatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5247: yadi pratiṣidhyate nobhayakāraṇopapattiḥ syāt/ ubhayakāraṇopapattivacanād anityatvakāraṇopapattir abhyanujñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5251: samāno vyāghātaḥ/ ekasya nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaṃ vyāhataṃ bruvatoktaṃ pratiṣedha iti cet?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5252: svapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ samāno vyāghātaḥ, sa ca naikatarasya sādhaka iti//26//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5264: prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti bruvatā kāraṇata utpattir abhidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5265: na kāryasya kāraṇaniyamaḥ/ yadi ca kāraṇāntarād apy utpadyamānasya śabdasya tad anityatvam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5270: na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhiḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5271: āvaraṇāadyanupalabdheḥ/ yathā vidyamānasyodakāder arthasyāvaraṇāder anupalabdhiḥ naivaṃ śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇenāvaraṇādinānupalabdhiḥ/ gṛhyeta caitad asyāgrahaṇakāraṇam udakādivat,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5272: na gṛhyate/ tasmād udakādiviparītaḥ śabdo 'nupalabhyamāna iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5273: NyS_5,1.29: tadanupalabdher anupalambhād abhāvasiddhau tadviparītopapatter anupalabdhisamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5274_0: teṣām āvaraṇādīnām anupalabdhir nopalabhyate / anupalambhān nāstīty abhāvo 'syāḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5274_1: sidhyati / abhāvasiddhau hetvabhāvāt tadviparītam astitvam āvaraṇādīnām avadhāryate /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5274_2: tadviparītopapatter yatpratijñātaṃ ``na prāg uccāraṇād vidyamānasya śabdasyānupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:5274_3: ity'' etan na sidhyati / so 'yaṃ hetur ``āvaraṇādyanupalabdher'' ity āvaraṇādiṣu
GSP29nysvbh1u:5280: āvaraṇādyanupalabdhir nāsti, anupalambhād ity ahetuḥ/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5281: anupalambhātmakatvād anupalabdheḥ/ upalambhābhāvamātratvād anupalabdheḥ/ yad asti tad upalabdher viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5282: upalabdhyā tad astīti pratijñāyate/ yan nāsti tad anupalabdher viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5283: anupalabhyamānaṃ nāstīti pratijñāyate/ so 'yam āvaraṇādyanupalabheḥ anupalambha upalabdhyabhāve 'nupalabdhau svaviṣaye pravarttamāno na svaviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5285: apratiṣiddhā cāvaraṇādyanupalabdhir hetutvāya kalpate/ āvaraṇādīni tu vidyamānatvād upalabdher viṣayāḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5286: teṣām upalabdhyā bhavitavyam/ yat tāni nopalabhyante,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5287: tad upalabdheḥ svaviṣayapratipādikāyā abhāvād anupalambhād anupalabdher viṣayo gamyate --- na santy āvaraṇādīni śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇānīti/ anupalambhāt tv anupalabhiḥ sidhyati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5293_0: ahetur iti varttate / śarīre śarīre jñānavikalpānāṃ bhāvābhāvau saṃvedanīyau / asti
GSP29nysvbh1u:5293_1: me saṃśayajñānaṃ nāsti me saṃśayajñānam iti / evaṃ pratyakṣānumānāgamasmṛtijñāneṣu /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5293_2: seyam āvaraṇāadyanupalabdhir upalabdhyabhāvaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ --- nāsti me śabdasyāvaraṇādyupalabdhir
GSP29nysvbh1u:5293_3: iti nopalabhyante śabdasyāgrahaṇakāraṇāny āvaraṇādīnīti / tatra yad uktaṃ tad anupalabdher
GSP29nysvbh1u:5299_0: anityena ghaṭena sādharmyād anityaḥ śabda iti bruvato 'sti ghaṭenānityena sarvabhāvānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5299_1: sādharmyam iti sarvasyānityatvam aniṣṭaṃ sampadyate / so 'yam anityatvena pratyavasthānād
GSP29nysvbh1u:5305_0: pratijñādyavayavayuktaṃ vākyaṃ pakṣanivartakaṃ pratipakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ / tasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:5305_1: pakṣeṇa pratiṣedhyena sādharmyaṃ pratijñādiyogaḥ / tad yady anityasādharmyād anityatvasyāsiddhiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5312: dṛṣṭānte ca sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñātasya dharmasya hetutvāt tasya cobhayathābhāvān nāviśeṣaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5313: dṛṣṭānte yaḥ khalu dharmaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena prajñāyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5317: kutaścid viśiṣṭaḥ/ sāmānyāt sādharmyaṃ viśeṣāc ca vaidharmyam/ evaṃ sādharmyaviśeṣo hetuḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5318: nāviśeṣeṇa sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ vā/ sādharmyamātraṃ vaidharmyamātraṃ cāśritya bhavān āha --- ``sādharmyāt tulyadharmopapatteḥ sarvānityatvaprasaṅgād anityasam'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5319: etad ayuktam iti/ aviśeṣasamapratiṣedhe ca yad uktaṃ tad api veditavyam//34//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5323: NyS_5,1.35: nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5324: anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyate/ tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde nityam athānityam?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5326: dharmasya sadā bhāvād dharmiṇo 'pi sadā bhāva iti nityaḥ śabda iti/ atha na sarvadā bhavati?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5327: anityatvasyābhāvān nityaḥ śabdaḥ/ evaṃ nityatvena pratyavasthānān nityasamaḥ//35//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5332: NyS_5,1.36: pratiṣedhye nityam anityabhāvād anitye 'nityatvopapatteḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5333: pratiṣedhye śabde nityam anityatvasya bhāvād ity ucyamāne 'nujñātaṃ śabdasyānityatvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5334: anityatvopapatteś ca ``nānityaḥ śabda'' iti pratiṣedho nopapadyate/ atha nābhyupagamyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5335: nityam anityatvasya bhāvād iti hetur na bhavatīti hetvabhāvāt pratiṣedhānupapattir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5338: tatra paripraśnānupapattiḥ/ yo 'yaṃ paripraśnaḥ --- tad anityatvaṃ kiṃ śabde sarvadā bhavati atha neti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5340: utpannasya yo nirodhād abhāvaḥ śabdasya tad anityatvam;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5341: evaṃ ca saty adhikaraṇādheyavibhāgo vyāghātān nāstīti/ nityānityatvavirodhāc ca/ nityatvam anityatvaṃ ca ekasya dharmiṇo dharmāv iti virudhyete, na sambhavataḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5343: tatra yad uktaṃ --- nityam anityatvasya bhāvān nitya eva, tad avartamānārtham uktam iti//36//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5347: prayatnānantarīyakatvād anityaḥ śabda iti/ yasya prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ tat khalv abhūtvā bhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5348: yathā ghaṭādikāryam; anityam iti ca bhūtvā na bhavatīty etad vijñāyate/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5350: evam avasthite prayatnakāryānekatvād iti pratiṣedha ucyate/ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaś ca dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnām,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5351: vyavadhānāpohāc cābhivyaktir vyavahitānām/ tat kiṃ prayatnānantaram ātmalābhaḥ śabdasyāho 'bhivyaktir iti viśeṣo nāsti/ kāryāviśeṣeṇa pratyavasthānam kāryasamaḥ//37//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5357: sati kāryānyatve anupalabdhikāraṇopapatteḥ prayatnasyāhetutvaṃ śabdasyābhivyaktau/ yatra prayatnānantaram abhivyaktis tatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānam upapadyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5366: hetoś ced anaikāntikatvam upapadyate anaikātikatvād asādhakaḥ syād iti/ yadi cānaikāntikatvād asādhakatvam ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5369: kiñcit pratiṣedhati kiñcin neti anaikāntikatvād asādhaka iti/ atha vā śabdasyānityatvapakṣe prayatnānantaram utpādo nābhivyaktir iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5370: nityatvapakṣe 'pi prayatnānantaram abhivyaktir notpāda iti viśeṣahetvabhāvaḥ/ so 'yam ubhayapakṣasamo viśeṣahetvabhāva ity ubhayam apy anaikātikam iti//39//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5375: sarveṣu sādharmyaprabhṛtiṣu pratiṣedhahetuṣu yatra yatrāviśeṣo dṛśyate tatrobhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samaḥ prasajyata iti//40//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5379: yo 'yaṃ pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvam āpadyate so 'yaṃ pratiṣedhasya vipratiṣedhe 'pi samānaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5381_0: tatrānityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti sādhanavādinaḥ sthāpanā prathamaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5381_1: pakṣaḥ / ``prayatnakāryānekatvāt kāryasama'' iti dūṣaṇavādinaḥ pratiṣedhahetunā dvitīyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5381_2: pakṣaḥ / sa ca pratiṣedha ity ucyate / tasyāsya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa iti tṛtīyaḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5381_3: pakṣaḥ vipratiṣedha ucyate / tasmin pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣo 'naikāntikatvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5384: NyS_5,1.42: pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5385_0: pratiṣedhaṃ dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya taduddhāram akṛtvānujñāya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe
GSP29nysvbh1u:5385_1: tṛtīyapakṣe samānam anaikāntikatvam iti samānaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ prasañjayato dūṣaṇavādino
GSP29nysvbh1u:5391: sthāpanāpakṣe prayatnakāryānekatvād iti doṣaḥ sthāpanāhetuvādinaḥ svapakṣalakṣaṇo bhavati/ kasmāt?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5392_1: pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity upapadyamānaṃ doṣaṃ parapakṣe upasaṃharati / itthaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5392_2: cānaikāntikaḥ pratiṣedha iti hetuṃ nirdiśati / tatra svapakṣalakṣaṇāpekṣayopapadyamānadoṣopasaṃhāre
GSP29nysvbh1u:5392_3: hetunirdeśe ca saty anena parapakṣadoṣo 'bhyupagato bhavati / kathaṃ kṛtvā?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5394: tam anuddhṛtya pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa ity āha/ evaṃ sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayataḥ parapakṣābhyupagamāt samāno doṣo bhavati/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5396: yathā parasya pratiṣedhaṃ sadoṣam abhyupetya pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā prasajyata iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5397: tathāsyāpi sthāpanāṃ sadoṣām abhyupetya pratiṣedhe 'pi samānaṃ doṣaṃ prasañjayato matānujñā prasajyata iti/ sa khalv ayaṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pakṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5400: nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid asti/ samānas tṛṭīyapañcamayoḥ punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5401: tṛṭīyapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' iti samānatvam abhyupagamyate/ pañcamapakṣe 'pi ``pratiṣedhavipratiṣedhe samāno doṣaprasaṅgo'' 'bhyupagamyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5402: nārthaviśeṣaḥ kaścid ucyata iti/ tatra pañcamaṣaṣṭhapakṣayor arthāviśeṣāt punaruktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5404: prathamadvitīyayor viśeṣahetvabhāva iti ṣaṭpakṣyām ubhayor asiddhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5406_0: yadā ``pratiṣedhe 'pi samāno doṣa'' ity evaṃ pravarttate / tadobhayoḥ pakṣayor asiddhiḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5406_1: yadā tu ``kāryānyatve prayatnāhetutvam anupalabdhikāraṇopapatter'' ity anena tṛṭīyapakṣo yujyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5409: nābhivyaktir'' iti siddhaḥ prathamapakṣo na ṣaṭpakṣī pravartata iti//43//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5415: tad idānīṃ vibhajanīyam/ nigrahasthānāni khalu parājayavastūny aparādhādhikaraṇāni prāyeṇa pratijñādyavayavāśrayāṇi tattvavādinam atattvavādinaṃ cābhisaṃplavante/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5422_0: pratijñāhāniḥ pratijñāntaraṃ pratijñāvirodhaḥ pratijñāsannyāso hetvantaram arthāntaraṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5422_1: nirarthakam avijñātārtham apārthakam aprāptakālaṃ nyūnam adhikaṃ punaruktam ananubhāṣaṇam
GSP29nysvbh1u:5422_2: ajñānam apratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ niranuyojyānuyogo 'pasiddhānto
GSP29nysvbh1u:5428_2: śabdo ghaṭavad'' ity kṛte apara āha -- dṛṣṭam aindriyakatvaṃ sāmānye nitye,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5429: kasmān na tathā śabda iti pratyavasthite idam āha ---
GSP29nysvbh1u:5431: yady aindriyakaṃ sāmānyaṃ nityaṃ kāmaṃ ghaṭo nityo 'stv iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5433: sa khalv ayaṃ sādhakasya dṛṣṭāntasya nityatvaṃ prasañjayan nigamanāntam eva pakṣaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5440: pratijñātārtho ``anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ghaṭavad'' ity ukte yo 'sya pratiṣedhaḥ pratidṛṣṭāntena hetuvyabhicāraḥ --- sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5442: ``dharmavikalpād'' iti dṛṣṭāntapratidṛṣṭāntayoḥ sādharmyayoge dharmabhedāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ sarvagatam aindriyakas tv asarvagato ghaṭa iti dharmavikalpāt,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5444: yathā ghaṭo 'sarvagata evaṃ śabdo 'py asarvagato ghaṭavad evānitya iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5447: asarvagata iti dvitīyā pratijñā pratijñāntaram/ tat kathaṃ nigrahasthām iti?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5450: tad etad asādhanopādānam anarthakam iti/ ānarthakyān nigrahasthānam iti//3//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5455: guṇavyatiriktaṃ dravyam iti pratijñā, ``rūpādito 'rthāntarasyānupalabdher'' iti hetuḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5462: guṇavyatiriktaṃ ca dravyaṃ rūpādibhyaś cārthāntarasyānupalabdhir iti virudhyate --- vyāhanyate na sambhavatīti//4//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5467: anityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvād ity ukte paro brūyāt sāmānyam aindriyakaṃ na cānityam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5469: evaṃ śabdo 'py aindriyako na cānitya iti/ evaṃ pratiṣiddhe pakṣe yadi brūyāt --- ``ka punar āhānityaḥ śabda'' iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5473: NyS_5,2.6: aviśeṣokte hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣam icchato hetvantaram ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5474: nidarśanam --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktam iti pratijñā/ kasmād dhetoḥ?
GSP29nysvbh1u:5475: ekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt/ mṛtpūrvakāṇāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ parimāṇam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5476_0: yāvān prakṛter vyūho bhavati tāvān vikāra iti / dṛṣṭaṃ ca prativikāraṃ parimāṇam /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5476_1: asti cedaṃ parimāṇam prativyaktaṃ tadekaprakṛtīnāṃ vikārāṇāṃ parimāṇāt paśyāmo vyaktam idam ekaprakṛtīti /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5478_0: asya vyabhicāreṇa pratyavasthānaṃ --- nānāprakṛtīnām ekaprakṛtīnāṃ ca vikārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5478_1: parimāṇam iti / evaṃ pratyavasthite āha --- ekaprakṛtisamanvaye sati śarāvādivikārāṇāṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5478_2: parimāṇadarśanāt / sukhaduḥkhamohasamanvitaṃ hīdaṃ vyaktaṃ parimitaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5479_0: --- tatra prakṛtyantararūpasamanvayābhāve saty ekaprakṛtitvam iti / tad idam aviśeṣokte
GSP29nysvbh1u:5479_1: hetau pratiṣiddhe viśeṣaṃ bruvato hetvantaraṃ bhavati / sati ca hetvantarabhāve pūrvasya
GSP29nysvbh1u:5479_2: hetor asādhakatvān nigrahasthānam / hetvantaravacane sati yadi hetvarthanidarśano dṛṣṭānta upādīyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5483: dṛṣṭānte hetvarthasyānidarśitasya sādhakabhāvānupapatter ānarthakyād dhetor anivṛttaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//6//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5489_0: hetutaḥ sādhyasiddhau prakṛtāyāṃ brūyāt --- nityaḥ śabdo 'sparśatvād iti hetuḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5489_1: hetur nāma hinoter dhātos tuni pratyaye kṛdantaṃ padam / padaṃ ca nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ /
GSP29nysvbh1u:5490: dhātvarthamātraṃ ca kālābhidhānaviśiṣṭam/ prayogeṣv arthād abhidyamānārūpā nipātāḥ/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5492: upasṛjyamānāḥ kriyāvadyotakā upasargā ity evamādi/ tadarthāntaraṃ veditavyam iti//7//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5496: yathā 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ --- kacaṭatapāḥ, javagaḍadaśatvāt, jhabhañ ghaḍhadhaṣavad iti ----
GSP29nysvbh1u:5498: evamprakāraṃ nirarthakam/ abhidhānābhidheyabhāvānupapattau arthagater abhāvād varṇā eva krameṇa nirdiśyanta iti//8//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5501: NyS_5,2.9: pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ trir abhihitam apy avijñātam avijñātārtham ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5502: yad vākyaṃ pariṣadā prativādinā ca trir abhihitam api na vijñāyate śliṣṭaśabdam apratītaprayogam atidrutoccaritam ity evamādinā kāraṇena,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5504: tadavijñātam avijñātārtham asāmarthyasaṃvaraṇāya prayuktam iti nigrahasthānam iti//9//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5508: yatrānekasya padasya vākyasya vā paurvāparyeṇānvayayogo nāstīty asambaddhārthatvagṛhyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5509: tat samudāyārthasyāpāyād apārthakam/ yathā --- daśa dāḍimāni, ṣaḍ apūpāḥ;
GSP29nysvbh1u:5511: kuṇḍam, ajājinam, palalapiṇḍaḥ, atha raurukam etad, kumāryāḥ pāyaṃ tasyāḥ pitā 'pratiśīna iti//10//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5517: tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāaptakālam asambaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānam iti//11//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5522: pratijñādīnām avayavānām anyatamenāpy avayavena hīnaṃ nyūnaṃ nigrahasthānam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5528: ekena kṛtatvād anyatarasyānarthakyam iti, tad etan niyamābhupagame veditavyam iti//13//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5532: NyS_5,2.14: śabdārthayoḥ punar vacanaṃ punaruktam anyatrānuvādāt ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5534: nityaḥ śabdo nityaḥ śabda iti śabdapunaruktam/ arthapunaruktam --- anityaḥ śabdo nirodhadharmako dhvanir iti/
GSP29nysvbh1u:5535: anuvāde tv apunaruktaṃ śabdābhyāsād arthaviśeṣopapatteḥ/ yathā hetvapadeśāt pratijñāyāḥ punar vacanaṃ nigamanam iti//14//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5539: punaruktam iti prakṛtam/ nidarśanam --- utpattidharmakatvād anityam ity uktvā arthād āpannasya yo 'bhidhāyakaḥ śabdas tena svaśabdena brūyād anutpattidharmakaṃ nityam iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5541: tac ca punarukataṃ veditavyam/ arthasampratyayārthe śabdaprayoge pratītaḥ so 'rtho 'rthāpttyeti//15//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5545: NyS_5,2.16: vijñātasya pariṣadā, trir abhihitasyāpy apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5547: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad apratyauccāraṇaṃ tad ananubhāṣaṇaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/ apratyuccārayan kimāśrayaṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhaṃ brūyāt//16//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5553: prativādinā trir abhihitasya yad avijñātaṃ tad ajñānaṃ nāma nigrahasthānam iti/ ayaṃ khalv avijñāya kasya pratiṣedhaṃ brūyād iti//17//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5557: parapakṣapratiṣedha uttaram, tad yadā na pratipadyate tadā nigṛhīto bhavati//18//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5562: yatra kartavyaṃ vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinatti --- idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5564: vikṣepo nāma nigrahasthānam/ ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayam eva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyata iti//19//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5568: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā ||
GSP29nysvbh1u:5569: yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamyānuddhṛtya vadati --- bhavatpakṣe 'pi samāno doṣa iti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5571: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñāṃ nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyata iti//20//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5577: tasyopekṣaṇaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ prāpto 'sīty ananuyogaḥ/ etac ca kasya parājaya ity anuyuktayā pariṣadā vacanīyam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5578: na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ vivṛṇuyād iti//21//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5583: nigrahasthālakṣaṇasya mithyādhyavasāyād anigrahasthāne nigṛhīto 'sīti paraṃ bruvan niranuyojyānuyojgān nigṛhīto veditavya iti//22//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5588: kasyacid arthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayato 'pasiddhānto veditavyaḥ/ yathā na sad ātmānaṃ jahāti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5591: nāsad utpadyata iti siddhāntam abhyupetya svapakṣaṃ vyavasthāpayati --- ekaprakṛtīdaṃ vyaktaṃ vikārāṇām anvayadarśanāt/ mṛdanvitānāṃ śarāvādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam ekaprakṛtitvam,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5592_0: tathā cāyaṃ vyaktabhedaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohānvito dṛśyate / tasmāt samanvayadarśanāt
GSP29nysvbh1u:5592_1: sukhādibhir ekaprakṛtīdaṃ viśvam iti / evam uktavān anuyujyate --- atha pratṛtir
GSP29nysvbh1u:5592_2: vikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣitavyam iti / yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5593: sā prakṛtiḥ/ yad dharmāntaraṃ pravartate nivartate vā sa vikāra iti/ so 'yaṃ pratijñātārthaviparyāsād aniyamāt kathāṃ prasañjayati/ pratijñātaṃ khalv anena --- nāsad āvirbhavati,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5595_0: na sat tirobhavatīti / sadasatoś ca tirobhāvāvirbhāvam antareṇa na kasyacit pravṛttiḥ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5595_1: pravṛttyuparamaś ca bhavati / mṛdi khalv avasthitāyāṃ bhaviṣyati śarāvādilakṣaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh1u:5596: abhūd iti ca pravṛttyuparamaḥ/ tad etad mṛddharmāṇām api na syāt/ evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataś cātmahānam asataś cātmalābham abhyupaiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5597: tad asyāpasiddhānato nigrahasthānaṃ bhavati/ atha nābhyupaiti,
GSP29nysvbh1u:5603_0: hetvābhāsāś ca nigrahasthānāni / kiṃ punar lakṣaṇāntarayogād hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvam
GSP29nysvbh1u:5603_1: āpannāḥ yathā pramāṇāni prameyatvam ity ata āha --- yathoktā iti / hetvābhāsalakṣaṇenaiva
GSP29nysvbh1u:5605: ta ime pramāṇādayaḥ padārthā uddiṣṭā lakṣitāḥ parīkṣitāś ceti//24//
GSP29nysvbh1u:5606: yo 'kṣapādam ṛṣiṃ nyāyaḥ pratyabhād vadatāṃ varam/
